"Not here," said Bubby "I'll just leave it for her then."

She walked into the room, every foot fall shook the floor. Before he could even think about running the colossal giantess crossed the space between them in two strides.

THUD

Ash was thrown to the floor with the impact and displacement of air. She had just missed him. This was insane!

Bubby placed whatever she was holding on Francine's desk. Then she turned to leave just as fast as she had entered. Once again Ash found himself in her path and with only seconds to react if there was anything he could to prevent what might happen.
1142334.title: Bubby Frensky (Francine's Grandmother)

1143.content: Who else could it be?
1143.title: Other Choices

choices: She Feels something in her Shoe
She's going to a Sleep Over
11431.content:
Never in his life could Ash have imagined that such a huge being could even exist.

Muffy Crosswire towered over Ash like a skyscraper. The voice in the back of his mind was telling Ash to move, to jump up and down, and to yell for help. But he was too much in awe to do anything. He watched her glance to the left and heard her wiggle her foot into the shoe beside him. Satisfied she turned her attention to her other shoe. Ash broke out of the trance he was in.

�Help! Help Me!!! Hey! I�m down here in your shoe!!�

Muffy glanced down, Had She heard him?

"Oh thank G--"

No, she'd paused only a moment to guide her foot into the shoe he was in.

�Wait! No! STOP!!!!�

Muffy's stocking covered foot blocked out his view of the outside world. He didn't know if he could make it to the toe of the shoe in time but that didn't mean he wasn't going to try. He started running as her toes wiggled into the shoe. Just when he thought he was going to make it he felt something heavy fall on top of him and drag him forward. Ash desperately grabbed at the stocking to keep from sliding under the Instep of the foot on top of him. As her foot settled in the shoe Ash was trapped under her toes. He felt the foot flex all around him and he was suddenly air borne as Muffy began to walk.

THUD!!
THUD!!
THUD!!

Each footstep jarred him so badly Ash hoped she wasn�t walking very far.
11431.title: Muffy

choices: Buster Feels something in his sneaker
Ash's Body can't take it anymore
11432.content:
Buster Baxter, A several hundred foot tall Buster Baxter, stared down towards Ash with a smile on his giant face. He was looking down, but he wasn't looking at the tiny human nor did it seem he had even noticed him. As for Ash, he gazed up with udder shock and amazement. Seemingly glued to the spot. In fact he didn't think about moving until Buster lifted a dirty sock covered foot.

By the time he had started running, the race was already over. The huge appendage struck him from behind. As he hit the insole of the sneaker it was sliding over him. It hooked him He was rolled over on his back and then came the almost unbearable weight as the foot settled into the sneaker. Ash couldn't tell where he was, but if he could see he would see that he was under the ball of the socked foot. He couldn't breath, not only from the weight bearing down on him but of the smell. when was the last time he'd changed his sock? He didn't think it could get any worst. Then buster started walking.

The only time he could get a breath of air was when the foot was off the air and swinging forward. It was quickly pushed out as the foot touched the ground and bore Buster's weight. At that point he was pressed up into fleshed covered in a rope-like woven material.

Foom

Foom

FOOM

The human body wasn't designed to take this kind of punishment. Sooner or later Ash's body was going to reach it's breaking point. He had to do something to get out of this, but it looked like his fate was now in the hands of Buster Baxter.
11432.title: Buster

114322.content:
As the foot began it's downward decent for yet another foot step Ash wondered if this was truly the end. He got his answer seconds later and was only conscious of it for a brief millisecond of pain before his body collapsed with an inaudible

SQUELCH .

Buster was just three steps out the front door of his house when he felt a tiny wet spot form under the ball of his foot. He paused for a moment and considered removing his sneaker, but he shrugged and continued walking.

With every step Ash's body became more pulverized. The softer flesh parts were eventually pressed between the weave of the sock and becoming grind on the sole of Buster's foot. The rest became a stain. One of many on the bottom of the sock that never quite got washed out no matter how many times Buster's mother washed it.

Eventually the sock was thrown away.
114322.title: Ash's Body can't take it anymore

choices: Slipped her Loafer off to see what it was
A Limo drives up (Muffy wanting Fern to join her to the Sugar Bowl)
Fern scrunches her toes one more time.
114333.content:
Fern looked down at her brown loafers, and noted how worn they were starting to look, she'd should've gotten new ones, but they were too comfortable to throw away and they would be okay for a while yet. If she hadn't been focused on the outside of her loafers and had looked inside she might have noticed a tiny creature staring up out from her right loafer. Instead she lifted her right foot and began to slip it in.

For Ash it came too quick to react. The sock covered foot with the outline of the toes clearly visible was upon him, driving him into the insole and sliding him back to the toe section as it moved forward. Soft flesh molded around him encasing him in darkness. He couldn't be sure where he'd ended up but he was fairly certain that he was somewhere under the ball of the foot. Maybe near the toes. The soft insole and the soft padded flesh above kept the thousands of pounds of giant from crushing him completely. For the moment.

Then Fern began to walk. First the assent, then the forward momentum, then the decent with a bone jarring THUD and the foot above pressing him into the insole with a weight that almost did him in. The process repeated itself again and again and again.

Fern walked down the sidewalk. Normally she would be on her way to The Sugar Bowl, but today she was heading to Mrs. Powers's Ice Cream Shop. She was enjoying the warm weather and felt ice cream was in order. Of course she could've gotten that at the Sugar Bowl but today she was in the mood to try the competition. It wasn't long before she met up with a friend who was happening to be coming from the very establishment. And why not? His mother owned it.

"Hi Brain"

She stood and had brief conversation with Alan Powers, AKA "The Brain". But as she bid Brain "See you later" and continued on her way Fern began to notice a sensation in her right loafer, just under the Ball of her foot. She thought nothing of it at first, it became distracting. She stopped again and looked down.

"Hmm"

It definitely felt like something was squirming in her Loafer. She wiggled her toes, did an ant crawl inside? She rubbed her foot against the insole of the loafer. Whatever the Object was she felt it move under her toes. It wasn't moving then.

Fern thought then
114333.title: Fern Walters

choices: "You can stay here, if you are afraid"
"I could call her to come over here."
114334.content:
The sight that greeted Ash was burned into his memory. An immense giant in a navy blue skirt and light blue top, a...Rabbit judging from the ears protruding from the not quite shoulder length brown hair. It...no...SHE....didn't look down. Not even when she lifted a foot wearing a light blue sock over the opening he was staring out from. The foot had just about covered the opening of the shoe before Ash cried out in fear and astonishment.

The Foot immediately withdrew. She tilted her head down, her expression a mix of surprise and confusion. It was then that Ash noticed her eyes. She looked down, but didn't see. Ash couldn't be sure, but she appeared to be blind.

She reached down with one hand and lifted the shoe. The sudden acceleration knocked him on his back.

"Is there something in my shoe?"

Probing fingers reached into the slipper and fell upon Ash's pron body. There was a gasp and the fingers withdrew for a moment, then slowly returned. The tip of the great index finger carefully traced Ash's body. The fingers lifted away, then the whole shoe tipped and Ash cried out as he tumbled into the cupped palm of the Girl Rabbit's hand.

Ash looked up into the face of the Rabbit girl. He looked into the eyes. There was a blank stare, no focus of the pupils. She was most certainly blind.

"What Are you?" Ash found himself saying.

"I was about to ask you the same question." Humid breath blew over Ash, he was thankful that though saturated with moisture it smelled clean.

"P-perhaps an introduction is in order. My name is Ash, I'm from the planet Earth in the Terran Solar System."

"My name is Marina , Marina Datillo. Also from the planet Earth. It's nice to meet you Ash."

Ash frowned. He was still on Earth? Must be an alternate Earth. That, or he was slipped into the Twilight Zone. Marina extended the tip of her forefinger toward him. This confused him at first, until he realized this was her attempt at shaking hands. Ash stood and ran his hand over the white surface of the finger, feeling the dermal surface.

"Nice to meet you Marina." He said " Is this as strange to you as it is for me?"

Marina nodded " Very. Are there anymore like you?"

"Not around here." said Ash "where ever here is. No more in you're shoe if that's what you are wondering."

"How did you get here?"

"I don't know." Admitted Ash. "One moment I was walking down a dirt path, and the next I was lying on the insole of you're shoe just as you showed up."

"You seem calm for such a tiny creature." Marina noted.

"I'm actually scared as heck." said Ash "It's not every day you meet a Giant. But there's no point in freaking out and screaming "Don't Eat Me". First impression is very important after all."

Marina giggled "I won't hurt you Ash. Even though I can't see you. You may have guessed I'm Blind."

"I came to that conclusion and an inspection of your eyes sort of confirmed it. Hey, maybe that's why you can hear me. They say when a person looses one sense the other's heighten to compensate. Either way I'm glad I didn't end up trapped in your shoe. Who knows what might've happened."

"I know what would've happened." Marina replied "I was about to go for a walk. I'm meeting a friend. Would you like to meet her?"

Ash thought for a moment."I'm not sure, I---"
114334.title: Meeting Marina Datillo

choices: They want to play with him
1143342.content:
"Hey wait a sec--"

That's all he was able to say before the hand closed. The last thing he saw was the expression on Marina's face and her unseeing eyes. She had a mischievous look, but not what could be called malicious.

"Now stay still, I don't want to crush you."

Marina slipped her shoes back on her feet and made her way from memory downstairs to where here mother was waiting.

"All set?"

Marina nodded. A few moments later she was sitting in the front passenger seat of her mother's car heading for her friends house. All the while, she held her left hand closed and resting on her lap. She held her hand just tight enough to keep the tiny creature in her hand immobile but not enough to cause actual harm. She could feel his breath on her palm. It was very minute, but she could feel it. One of the effects of being born blind she supposed.

For Ash, the ride in hot and clammy darkness could've been better and could've been worst. In order to take his mind off his growing fears he decided to look at this through a scientific perspective, and quickly threw most of what he'd learned out the window. So he focused on what science he could use, the flesh around him for starters. He could stick his fingers between the dermal swirls of the skin. They came back feeling oily.

She began to move again. He soon began to hear other voices. They were muffled though the flesh around him, he couldn't make out what was being said.

When the hand opened once more, a few face stared down at Ash. He was quickly scooped up between thumb and finger and held before a huge dark eye.

"I can't make out what he looks like" Prunella concluded "His face I mean. I'll need a magnifying glass for that. But he is wearing clothes." Without realizing she was doing it, she gently rolled him between her fingers musing to herself. "maybe he has a supernatural origin."

"Prunella, don't do that. You're scaring him"

"Oh!" Prunella looked at the creature between her fingers. "Sorry."

"Maybe you better let me hold him"

Ash was once again deposited into Marina's hand. Other than a film of oil on his skin he was unharmed. He looked up at the slender figure of Prunella. She had a look of curiosity, as though she was looking at a new kind of bug but at least it wasn't disdain. What were they going to do to him?
1143342.title: Taken to see Prunella

115.content: size 6 wow someone that big has to a 5 years old and then someone came so you look up and saw.....?

choices: D.W Doesn't feel anything and begins to walk
D.W Feels something Takes her shoe off
D.W Feels something but ignors it.
1151.content:
"You've got to be kidding me...."

He easily recognized the being from a cartoon he used to watched, but this was no cartoon the person towering above him looked all too real. Ash immediately realized he was as good as dead.

The owner of the shoe was a four year old aardvark girl named D.W. Right now at just over three feet tall she didn't seem to be much of a threat to anyone, but to the micro human in her right shoe staring up at her she looked three hundred and seventy feet. He remembered D.W and the way she reacted to bug size creatures. If she saw him he was dead, if she didn't see him and squeezed her foot into the shoe, he was dead. If he survived her foot on top of him, she'd probably feel him, freak out and stomp her foot. No matter which way he looked at it, he was dead. He hadn't expected or thought in a million years that he'd die this way...

D.W smiled down. Not because she saw what was in her shoe but because she was getting ready for a party. She lifted her socked foot, cute round toes pointing right at him. Ash cried out but his cries were muffled as D.W's foot began to make it's way into the shoe. Still desperate to try and survive he bolted to the toe of the shoe. He turned in time to get knocked down on his back; heavy fabric covered flesh fell around him. D.W's Toes wiggled into place. With almost no air to breath and with no room to move, Ash waited his Fate.
1151.title: dw

choices: On a slice of cake (Sunk under the iceing)
1152.content:
Timmy Tibble couldn't believe his stroke of luck. It was a rather funny looking bug, but small. Lucky for him he'd seen it before he put his shoe on. He held it in a closed hand and all kinds of thoughts and ideas of what he could do with that bug came to mind. Then One really stood out above all the others. It could get him in trouble, but he could always blame it on his brother.

He and his brother were at DW's Birthday Party. There were people everywhere and lots of food. He'd never seen anyone eat a bug before. Timmy walked up to a table that had trays and plates of cake and sandwiches and pudding. He held up his closed fist, pondered for a moment, and made his decision. Opening up his hand and pinching the strange bug between the fingers of his other hand, he placed the Bug....
1152.title: The Terror of the Timmy Tibble

11522.content:
Deep inside Ash there was a fear, a primal fear, the Fear of being eaten alive. And now that Fear had become a reality thanks to a King Kong sized four year old Brat. The icing of the cake was white and thick, and he'd been pushed into it good. It was like being in wet cement, though he could move his arms and legs he had no traction. He could do nothing but sit there and wait for someone to come over and eat him.

It was noisy, several voices speaking at once, someone had music on, he'd been screaming the whole time,all the while Giant versions of Arthur and his friends and family walked by. He was heard him by none of them. He couldn't yell loud enough to be heard over everything else. He knew somewhere the Tibble twin was watching and waiting anxiously.

Someone announced it was time to eat. They began to horde around the table, Hungry faces stared down at him, Hands reached down around him, he felt the slice of cake being lifted. looking upward he stared into the face of is unknowing executioner.
11522.title: On a slice of cake (Sunk under the iceing)

1153.content: If there are anymore, note me.
1153.title: Only other character I can think of

12.content:
Ash was definitely not in the woods. He was still outside, but the plants that towered over him resembled blades of grass.

Wait sec, blades of grass?

Rolling over on his stomach, Ash slowly tried to stand up. His head was splitting. Felt worst than any hangover he had ever had. After staggering to his feet Ash took a good look at his surroundings. They looked were blades of grass all right. Twenty-foot tall blades of grass but grass nonetheless. It was like a scene straight out of Honey I shrunk the Kids.

"Did I shrink? Nah, that’s impossible. There has to be a logical explanation for this. Maybe I bumped my head and I’m hallucinating, or maybe I'm still unconscious and I was dreaming all this."

It all felt too real to be a dream though.

Something jumped out from deeper in the jungle of grass. It was an Ant. Almost as big as Ash was with two foot long pinchers. Ash screamed in terror as it ran towards Him—and then right past him. An enormous cricket touched down just a few feet from where he was standing. It too leaped past Ash. Followed by a Spider, a centipede and a ground flea. They looked as though they were running away from something, but what the hell were they running away from?

He felt a tremor in the ground.

Then another, stronger than the first. Then another, and another becoming stronger and stronger each time. Ash soon began to hear a Thud and the sound of grass being crushed accompanying the tremor. They were giant Footsteps. Something big was coming. Ash tried to run but the tremors were becoming so intense that he was thrown to the ground. A shadow fell over him as something blocked out the sun. Ash looked up and saw--
12.title: Sonic  the Hedgehog

choices: Follow Sally to where ever she was heading.
Follow her tracks back to their source.
122.content:
Sally Acorn woke up that morning and thought it was such a nice day that she decided to go for a morning stroll. As she walked through a field of grass she hummed a little tune to herself. Little did she know what kind of panic she was causing with each step she took.

****

"I am in serious trouble."

As impossible as my brain was telling him, towering hundreds of off feet above the tree- er- grass line a giant version of Sally Acorn walked into Ash's field of vision. Her strides covered a great deal of distance and within a few seconds she upon him. An enormous blue booted foot soared overhead and crashed down in front of him, the heel only ten feet away from his head. Thrown through the air from the impact, Ash looked up in time to see her foot rise up into the air again as she took another step, dirt and debris rained down around him. Ash watched her continue on her way until she disappeared from his field of vision.

"I am in very serious trouble...."

Any thoughts he might of had of this being a dream were completely erased by this point. Ash had many questions running through his mind but he had no time to try to answer them. They could wait for a better time. It occurred to him that Sally wasn't going to be the only giant inhabitant he would encounter here. If Ash was going to survive, He needed to find shelter and some means of gaining their attention. Ash walked over to the crater like footprint Sally left behind in her wake. She wouldn't be hard to follow if he chose to. She could be heading back to her house, or heading away from it.
122.title: Sally Acorn

choices: Ash lands in an ice cream cone held by Cream
Ash lands somewhere on Rouge the Bat
Ash lands on Bunnie Rabbot's head
1221.content:
Ash figured He'd try to follow her; he didn't want to stay where He was because he could just end up as dirt under someone's shoe. What Ash didn't realise was how damn hard such a normally easy task was. He didn't take into account the fact that despite her size, Sally was no slow poke. In fact by the time Ash made it to her next footprint she was miles away. Traveling under his own power just wasn't effective under those conditions.

As he was re-thinking his whole strategy, he began to feel tremors. It wasn't like the footsteps he felt before, this was a constant vibration and it was getting stronger. Whatever it was, was heading right for him.

"What the Fu--"

Ash caught of glimpse of something blue, there was a sudden tornado strength wind and he was suddenly airborne. All he could see was ground and sky over and over again as Ash flew tumbling out of control. His biggest concern of course was the landing. He figured if he survived the impact with the ground he'd probably have every bone in his body broken.

Fortunately, Or unfortunately, it looked like he wasn't going to hit the ground.As he tumbled He saw that he was falling towards a group of Sonic characters.
1221.title: Follow Sally to where ever she was heading.

12211.content:
On appearance, the cute rabbit was enjoying her favorite treat, with a cone on her hand and ice cream on her milky-white muzzle. However, Ash's perceptive told a tale straight out of Greek mythology.

The adventurer is stuck in a dense, but flavorful, patch of snow high in a spherical mountain top. Suddenly, a flowing cavern opens up amiss the white sky. As it opens, an enormous pink eyeless serpent wiggles out of the opening, digging and drawing out the snow, and dragging it into the abyss of the pinkish-red cavern. That serpent is relentless as it continues to truck more of this peach-flavored snow. Jason tries to break out the bounds of his cold imprisonment, but to no avail. The pink and slimy dragon continues to shrink more of this snow. It wasn't long until it approaches to the direction of this tiny thrill-seeker!

Cream now licked the ice cream, not alert that the part she licked contains Ash! Her tongue slowly pulled him and the ice cream he was stuck in towards the hot and moist cavern of her mouth, complete with the pearly white of her teeth and a living bobbing sign that points to the dark abyss of the young giantess' esophagus.

Cream’s Mouth closed encasing Ash in total darkness. The Ice cream all around him began to melt as the tongue underneath pressed him up against the pallet above as Cream savoured the flavour of the Ice cream.

Ash heard a loud “MMMMMMM” that vibrated through his body. Where ever his skin was bare he could feel the tingling of the taste buds as they reacted to his presence. he didn’t want to die this way, he remembered enough from Biology 101 that what lay beyond the esophagus wasn’t the greatest spot for a vacation.

The tongue dropped and tossed him into the middle of Cream’s mouth and propelled him back up against the roof of her mouth. There was a powerful suction and a loud GULP as cream swallowed.
12211.title: Ash lands in an ice cream cone held by Cream

choices: He manages to get Cream to know where he is
122111.content:
Before Ash could even react to the sudden great vacuum that was Creams mouth, his body was instantly propelled towards the cavernous entry of the rabbit girls massive throat. With wide eyes, Ash could simply watch as Cream's Massive Uvula pass right over him before descending down the huge fleshy tunnel with the cold treat.

Outside, Cream was completely oblivious about the tiny human she just swallowed whole as she was too concentrated on the delicious flavor of her ice cream. A large content smile emerges on her face as she closes her eyes blissfully at the sweet delicacy.

The trip down Cream's throat was a dizzying and unsettling ride that seemed to put even the great tower attractions of famous theme parks to shame. All about Ash the fleshy walls of Creams throat pulsated rhythmically against him and the goop of ice cream. It was almost as if the slimy pink walls themselves were eager to send him straight within the massive rabbit girls stomach. After what seemed like seconds of heart stopping tension, A great fleshy entryway soon opened slightly to accept the new entrants of the cavernous organ. In no time at all, the muscle hole sucks around Ash's body sending him shuddering by the strange and unsettling texture of the flesh.

Within seconds, Ash was soon met with the sounds of gurgles and the rhythmic beating of Cream as he descended into her belly. With a splash, he soon ends up landing within the mucky fluids that were the rabbit girls digestive juices. Immediately, he swam up and turns his head about trying to find some form of mass, food, anything to help stay afloat. Whether it was luck or fate, His request was soon answered as a small portion on the left side of Creams stomach was devoid of any sign of her juices. After using all his strength too swim past the hot fluids, he luckily manages to clamber upon the slimy surface of flesh gazing about the hot steamy chamber in shock.
122111.title: Ash is swallowed

choices: Cream decides to show Ash to Amy
Cream Takes him home as a pet
122112.content:
He stayed in her mouth. What a stroke of luck! But Light pour back in as Cream opened her mouth to take another lick.

As her tongue extended out Ash began to run towards the front of her mouth. Suddenly Cream’s Mouth closed shut and he was pinned between her the tip of her tongue and her front teeth. With his back to her teeth Jason was pressed face first into the tip of Cream’s tongue which began to explore his Body.

Cream felt something particularly off about what is her tongue was feeling. She knew that there wasn't any trace of toppings on her treat. She continued to feel the unwanted being all over his tiny body. In some parts, he giggled - in which that reaction echoes throughout her cavernous mouth. Luckily, the cute bunny heard that, suspecting something strange from inside.

As if Heaven's gate opens, a large beam of white light emited as the giantess opened her mouth. And just like Heaven, a goddess-like set of fingers appeared from the light, pinching Ash and drawing him out of her mouth.

The next sight Ash saw was the sight of the goddess herself! Her amber-colored eye peered over him, investigating the visitor of her mouth.

"Huh?" ponders Cream. "It's a bug! But it looks like a person." The little wanderer was still hanging in between the bunny's pinching fingers.

Cream sat down, continuing to enjoy her Ice cream while looking the tiny person between her fingers. How did this little person get in her mouth? Maybe he was inside the Ice cream. She paused wondering if there had been any more little people in her treat. Her heart began to sink.

She heard a little squeak. The tiny person was saying something but she couldn’t make it out. She smiled thinking how cute this tiny person was. She began to Lick her Ice cream again listening to squeaks.
122112.title: Ash remains in Cream's Mouth

1221121.content:
Ash yelled until his throat was raw but it was no use, while it seemed she heard him, she couldn’t make out what he was saying. If only he could get her to put him closer to her ear—

Crunch, Crunch, Crunch

Cream loudly munched on the cone, thinking thoughtfully about her little discovery.

Cream doesn't want to reveal to Amy about this tiny person on her fingers. She believes this will excite the hedgehog and makes him do something with both her and herself. Then she comes up with an idea, not original, but it may works . . . for as long as she doesn't show any signs that she obtains a very small person. "Mr. Bug," the giantess spoke to Ash in a cute manner. "I'm going to put you in my pocket. Please don't go anywhere".

With a smile, the skyscraper-sized rabbit drops Ash back in the orange pocket of her dress. She resumed her travels - until she arrived at the house Amy Rose lived. With manners, she knocked on the door of the house. It wasn't long until that pink hedgehog, garbed in her usual red hoop dress and matching boots, answers the door.

Amy greets, "Hi, Cream!"

"Hi, Amy," replies back. "What are you planning to do?"

"I got nothing! I was going to shop, but I had ended up spending all of my money. Plus, my Sonikku is off to another adventure in who-knows-what."

"Then can we play around at your house"

"I don't see why not. Come on in!" Amy welcomes Cream to her house as soon as she enters.

Cream has something on her mind, but doesn't have an answer. "Amy, what can we do?" Let's hope that Amy doesn't find out about the tiny freeloader from within Cream's breast pocket.

Ash sat at the bottom of Cream’s breast pocket the mixture of ice cream and saliva drying on his clothes. He considered himself fortunate the young giantess hadn’t freaked out thrown him to the ground and stomped his mangled body into the dirt. As it was, it wasn’t too bad being in her pocket.

“I have a new video game,” said Amy. “You wanna play Cream?”

“Yeah!”

Cream was on the move. She followed Amy to her living room and hoped onto the couch. A few moment’s later Ash heard some very familiar music.

“No, it can’t be…”

Climbing up the inside of the pocket he peered out at the world. Cream was holding a game controller, the game she was playing looked a lot like Super Mario 3. Well, Mario looked a little different but it was pretty much the same game. Looking to his right Ash could see Amy holding the other controller waiting her turn. For the next hour Ash watched as the two played, Cream was really good at it too for her age. Which didn't surprise Ash at all because on Earth they were teaching kids about computers at a very early age.

Amy paused the game."I'm going to get something to drink, would you like some milk?"

"Yes, Please."

When Amy left the room, Cream looked in at "Mr. Bug."

"Oh, hello. Watching me play, huh. Can't wait to play with you later."

'Oh, boy' Ash thought, wondering what this giantess had in mind for Play.
1221121.title: Cream decides to show Ash to Amy

1222.content:
There wasn’t any point for Ash to stay were he was so he began to follow the footprints back the way Sally had come from. But after three hours of walking it didn’t seem like he was making any progress. Which made sense considering Sally probably had a stride of around 200 feet. And he was walking blind except for the footprints he was following because he couldn’t see above the grass line. Ash stopped and climbed up a flower stem. When he was above the grass he could see his destination.

Miles in the distance Ash could see a cabin. Damn it, it was going to take forever to get there. He didn’t have anything better to do, but there had to be a quicker way. Ash was about to climb back down to ground level when he felt a vibration through the stem of the flower.

Looking all around, he saw a Giant version of Miles Prowler. AKA Tails. He was walking straight for him.

***

Tails was going to visit his Aunt Sally. Though she wasn't really his Aunt, he liked to call her that. As he was walking towards her house, he came across a flower growing alone in the grass infront of her house.

'She would really like that.' he thought as he knelt down to picked it.

***

A huge gloved hand wrapped around Ash and the stem of the flower. There was a huge tug as it was pulled out of the ground and he found himself falling among the huge fingers of the hand. Lucky for him because it was a short fall and if Ash had hit the ground he would’ve landed on his head. He felt himself rise into the air as Tails stood up and then he was moving forward.

'At least I'm heading toward my goal.' he thought.

***

Tails knocked on the door. “Aunt Sally? Are you home?” When he didn’t get a response he opened the door.

“Ah shucks, She’s not home. Oh well, I’ll just leave this flower….”
1222.title: Follow her Footprints back to their source.

choices: Try to find a way off the coffee table
12223.content:
Ash felt himself being lowered as Tails placed the flower on the coffee table. He released his grip and Ash tumbled out between his fingers next to the flower. He was completely oblivious to the tiny human's presence and Tails was out the door before Ash could even attempt to try to get his attention. At least he was inside now. There was less chances of being eaten by a predatory insect there, course the chances of being killed by a giant furry was still very high.

The cabin had all the comforts of home from what he could see of the place. The kitchen, dinning and living rooms combined into one. In front of Ash was a TV, Least It looked like one. Behind him was a couch. Ash walked to the edge of the coffee table.

Crap, It was a good Hundred-foot drop to the floor. He wasn't getting off this table any time soon. He began to feel vibrations again. Thank goodness for that early warning, unfortunately there were no places to hide on the coffee table accept for the flower. He ran back over to it as the front door opened and Sally walked in.

Peeking out from behind the flower Ash watched her take a drink from a cup she took from the sink and walk over towards the coffee table. How could something so big move so gracefully? Ash wasn't sure what her reaction to seeing him would be so Hiding in the flower would be a good Idea. But maybe he didn't have too. Hell, he was a small distance away from the flower and Tails hadn't noticed a damn thing. Ash had to make up his mind quick because she was almost there.
12223.title: On the Coffee Table

choices: Try to head to up her face
122231.content:
There was no way Ash was going to stand out in the open, not until he knew more about this being. Ash climbed up inside the flower and hid himself among its stamen and was quickly covered in sticky pollen. It made the perfect camouflage, but it was going to be a pain to get off. He heard a deep sigh and Sally sitting down. There was the sound off two boots being pulled off and two vibrating thuds as she propped her feet up onto the coffee table.

"What's this?"

Ash held on tightly as he felt the flower being lifted. There was a blur of motion; some disorientation and he found himself staring into the Sally's huge smiling face. Ash's heart was racing, He was fairly sure she couldn't see him but at his minuscule size, but she was intimidating.

"How sweet, Tails must've left it for me."

Sally brought the flower closer to her face, burried her nose in among the pedals to sniff it. Ash was pressed up against her nose as she deeply inhaled. He felt the suction immediately, and found himself being pulled toward a nostril. With every sniff Sally threatened snorted the tiny human up her nose and it wouldn't have taken much effort. With no other option Ash grabbed onto a strand of fur in a desperate attempt to keep from being sucked up her nose.

Sally took the flower away from her face and Ash soon found himself hanging from her nose.
122231.title: Hide in the flower

choices: She gives a full tour right after cleaning you off.
1222312.content:
You climb up onto her nose. You then wonder how you'll get her attention, but it seems like you didn't have to think about it at all. She noticed you right away and polite asked, "How may I help you?"

"Can she see and hear me or is she talking to someone else?" you thought out loud.

"I can see and hear you, despite the fact that you are pretty small. My name's Sally Acorn, what's yours?" she asked.

"I'm Ash. Nice to meet you," you reply.

"You seem too friendly to be working for Robotnik, so I am going to trust you. I'll let you stay here with me," she says.

"In that case, maybe you should offer me a tour of your house?" you requested.

"That's a good idea. If you're going to be living here with me, you might as well know your way around. However, I think we should clean the pollen off you first," she suggested.

"That's actually a good place to start," you responded.
1222312.title: Getting Sally's attention

choices: You began explaining all about yourself and your planet
A alarm sounds;an attack by Robotink
12223121.content:
As the Royal Princess of the planet Möbius gently hosed you off(in reality she dunked you a few times in her sink full of water)

"I apologize for this Ash but it's the only way I can think of to properly clean you off;I hope you don't mind getting a little wet." Sally stated a little nervously

"Cough,cough....No....not really!" You choked out as you were soaking wet from head to toe but the giant squirrel girl began drying you off with a small towel making sure every inch of you was spotless and pollen free!

"Alright...." Sally sighed after a few more minutes of looking you over "I think that did it how are you feeling better?" She asked you nodded

"Good! Alright well as you can tell this is my home sorry it's a bit of a mess but as princess to the planet Möbius I've personally placed myself in charge of the so-called Freedom Fighters to liberate the planet from the evil tyranny of Dr. Robotink whose enslaved most of the planet's people,transforming several of our friends and comrades into his robotic slaves and was solely responsible for banishing my father King Acorn....but that's for another time I suppose anyway....." As she gently picked you up and began showing you around her small hut

"And this of course is my kitchen area it's not very big but at least I have plenty of food so you won't have to worry about going hungry("That is if a certain blue hedgehog would stop coming in and sneaking off with it in the dead of night!") She muttered under her breath) and this is my workshop area and my personal computer I call her Nicole,she assists me-us in analyzing all of Robotink's latest schemes and is a great source of information." Sally pointed to the small old fashioned desktop computer in the corner of her hut

"Say hi Nicole,this is Ash he'll be staying with me for a while."

"Hello Ash!" The computer spoke in a female like HAL-9000 voice

"Hello." You muttered nervously

"And lastly this of course is my bed." Sally pointed out "Okay so that's the tour of my house maybe later on I'll give you the full tour of our planet itself but that's for later....anyway you must be so tired from all that climbing on me." Sally observed as she gently set you down on her table top studying you

"Er is there something wrong?" You asked after a while you really didn't like being stared at for a long period of time

"It's just that I have been trying to figure out exactly what kind of creature you are Ash." Sally said her finger on her chin thinking hard "I have never seen anything quite like you before except...well that's not possible but wait!" She said "Stay there for a bit!" She ordered and went over to talk to her computer

"Nicole I need a favor!" She said in a whisper

"What is it Sally?" The computer asked

"I need you to run a spot check on Ash! You know do a quick data search on what kind of species he is so we-I'll know he's not a spy for Robotink!" Sally said

"If I may Princess my scanners and sensors detect there's no trace of robotics or cybernetic within his life form he appears to be of organic origin." The computer said as a thin red beam of light flew over you and you immediately felt a odd tingling sensation

"That was incredibly odd!" You muttered

"Hmmmmmm you're right Nicole if he was a mechanic being I would have sensed it myself!" Sally said her finger still on her chin in thought as she walked back over to you

"Ash I'm sorry but I have to ask you where exactly do you come from? I'm sorry for being a bit nosy but I'm just curious you see." She explained

"It's no big deal Princess Sally I understand completely I come from a planet,another dimension miles away from our own called Earth it's a place filled with...." You started but she cut you off amazed

"Earth? What a odd name for a planet? Wait yo....you're a human aren't you?" She gushed out anotished

"Yo...you're actually familiar with humans?" You said in shock

"Actually yes you see according to legend or myth humans may have one time lived on this planet a very long time ago but our history said they either somehow died off or left for mysterious reasons before Möbius became populated with we animal humanoids....but still it's really amazing to actually see a real live human after all these years!" Sally observed excitedly as she gently picked you up smiling sunnily at you "We can learn a great deal from you Ash,from your species' way of life that is! I'm sorry if I offended you in anyway!" She apologized

"While that sounds like a good idea Princess Sally I'm afraid I won't be much use to you when it comes to this science stuff I'm not that good at it!" You stated truthfully but she shook her head

"Please you can call me Sally everyone does but I was referring to you teaching me how you live Ash! Tell me a bit about your world Earth,your way of life,your daily activities it must be very fascinating!" Sally brought you even closer to her enormous face

"Are you sure it won't interfere with your....." You pointed at Nicole

"No it's night time so I have plenty of time to spare. Go on tell me a bit about yourself Ash!" Sally said excitedly
12223121.title: She gives a full tour right after cleaning you ...

122231211.content: Does a message appear on nicole? Or does somwthing else happen before you can tell sally about yourself?
122231211.title: You began explaining all about yourself and you...

123.content: Is it tails or vanilla or someone else?
123.title: Tails

choices: Too much of a fan girl
1233322.title: Nah.

choices: Climb into her basket of Flowers
Get the heck away from her
124.content:
Cream was wandering around as usual on a day off.

She walked away from her house to her favourite field near the mountainside. At that time of the year the field was full of wonderful flowers. As always when she would go here she had a basket with her that she used to collect the flowers. Cream knelt down to pick up many different flowers as she could; planning to make a nice bouquet for her mother out of them.

***

Ash's jaw hit the ground.

Staring up through giant flowers he saw a Giant version of Cream the Rabbit. She was humming a little tune picking flowers that grew all around him. The huge tree like flower next to him was ripped out of the ground roots and all.

‘What power she has’ he thought in amazement.

He decided to try to get her attention; the problem was how? Oliver guessed he was no bigger than a tiny bug next to her.

****
Cream didn't take any notice of the figure, which was hidden between the flowers. She simply continued picking this or that flower humming her song and walking as well as jumping through the field - obviously unaware that with her jumps might cause what would feel like earthquakes to the bugs around her if she landed close to them - or that she might even step on them.

***
“Holy Aunt Petunia!”

Ash just managed to dodge a massive foot as it crashed down just mere inches away from his right leg. The kid was in a real good mood but that didn’t help him much, that last little hop she made nearly pan caked him. She hopped a bit again leaving a deep crater of a foot print behind.

***
Once her basket was full, she decided not to go home just yet. She fell backwards into the field to relax and enjoy the nice warmth.

***
Cream turned, placed her basket full of flowers to one side and promptly fell backwards. Between the wind from the displacement of air and the powerful tremor through the ground the Ash was sent sprawling.

When the dust had settled, Ash stood up staring at two huge feet propped up vertically, the soles of the shoes covered in clumps of dirt and debris. She was lying down.
124.title: Cream

1241.content:
Well, that made things easier for him.

Ash walked along her leg to the hem of her dress and climbed up onto it. His heart pounded in his chest, his breath quickened. This was either incredibly brave or incredibly stupid. Ash walked the length of her dress over her stomach and onto her chest. He found it hard to keep his balance with her chest moving up and down as she breathed. The young rabbit's eyes were closed so she hadn't seen him yet. And it was very doubtful that she had felt him as he made her way over her.
1241.title: Climb up onto Cream

12411.content:
He steeled himself, took in a deep breath to call out to her, and prayed what he was about to do wasn't going to get him killed.

Cream heard the voice. Instantly stood up to see who was calling, obviously sending the small figure on her chest tumbling head over heels down dress to the ground below. It didn’t go unnoticed, however. Cream saw something small falling off her landing at her feet. Looking down she saw a very small figure lying among the flowers. Cream knelt down but too afraid to even touch that figure as he seemed very fragile to her.

"Um... who are you?" she asked in amazement.

‘She heard me!’ Thought Ash. ‘I just took a tumble down a living mountain, but she heard me!’

Standing up he looked skyward to see that the young rabbit was indeed looking back at him with a look of surprise, concern, and curiosity.

“He-Hello!” he called out.

She frowned “I can’t hear you very well. I can just make out what your saying.”

‘What? How can she not hear me with ear’s that big?’ he though. ‘There must be some sort of range limit.’

Thinking quickly, Ash gestured for her to lower her hand down.

“Oh! Okay.”

The young rabbit lowered her hand palm up to ground level. She waited patiently as the tiny creature climbed into it and carefully lifted her hand up to her face. For the human it was a strange sensation. It was like being in a really big platform elevator. Aside from his ears popping he felt perfectly safe considering he was in a giant hand.

Cream silently whispered being unsure if she was too loud for him: "Um.. well.. who are you?" she said smiling.

She did try to keep her voice as calm as possible as she was unsure if he would be afraid of her size to him.

"I am Cream!" she introduced herself.

The human looked up into Cream’s face, her smile having a relaxing effect on him. He knew then that he had nothing to fear from her.

“Ash,” he replied. “What is this place?”

“This is the great forest.”

“What world?”

“Huh?”

“Never mind.” Ash looked up at Cream. “Is everyone around here as big as you?”

“Bigger” Said Cream carefully sitting on the ground. “I’m only a little girl.”

“Not from where I’m sitting,” Ash mumbled under his breath.

Cream wondered.. "Hmm.. well.. I was honest.. among my friends.. I am the smallest.. Well, if you count Cheese, he's my little Chao friend - then I am not the smallest.. but he cannot speak."She then said.. "Oh where are you? Cheese!" she called.

Cheese was flying over.. still a tremendous amount larger than Ash. "Chao chao" the little chao cheered.

Cheese then smiled again: "Aww.. you little one are so cute, you know that."

"But well.. Tails is taller than me.. Mr. Sonic is taller.. and Mummy is like so tall.." she added.

She then asked: "Do you want to meet them?"
12411.title: Meeting Cream

124112.content:
Ash looked around at the creature flying about wondering how it stayed in the air. He wasn’t too sure about meeting others like Cream just yet. He was just getting used to Cream’s presence, he wasn’t sure his mind could take meeting more so soon.

“Uh, not just yet Cream.” He explained, “I need time to get used to all of this. Were I’m from people your size where only read about in story books.”

“Okay, would you like to see my room?”

Ash thought for a moment. He didn’t want to be a burden to Cream, but he knew the odds of him surviving on his own were not in his favour.

“Sure, I’d liked to.”

“Okay, I’ll put you in my pocket so I won’t loose you.”

“Good idea, I wouldn’t want to fall from this height.”

Cream cupped her hand and carefully lowered Ash into her dress pocket. He noted it was very deep. ‘Good,’ he though ‘less chances of falling out.’

Cream Picked up her basket of flowers and started for home, happy that she had made a new friend, even though he was a little on the tiny side. She tried to walk carefully rather than her usual jumping around.

"Is it okay like this?" she asked to her pocket.

She heard a "Yes" and went on.

***

10 minutes Cream entered the House she shared with her mother. "Mum, I am back" she called.

"Hi dearie!" said Vanilla meeting her daughter at the door.

Cream then handed over the basket of flowers: "Those are for you!" she said.

Vanilla smiled: "Thank you very much. They are wonderful. I'll put them on a table right away!"

As Ash didn't want to see Vanilla (Cream wasn't sure if he peaked out or not) she didn't introduce him just then. Instead she went to her room and locked the door behind herself. Reaching into her pocket she took Oliver out and placed him on the floor.

"I am sorry a bit. Mum always wants me to tidy up so right now it's a bit of a mess."

She took a small 3-inch figure of Sonic off her shelf and placed it next to Ash. "You should know him, he's the hero of our planet. Oh I have even more figures... so yeah.. Feel free to you look around."

Ash looked up at the Figure of Sonic. Damn, even a Child’s toy was bigger than him. He didn’t tell her that he honestly never heard of Sonic, though it was safe to say he’d have no trouble recognizing him if this figure represented an accurate likeness. He looked about the room. Over all it didn’t look that messy compared to the way he used to keep his room at that age, he could still remember his mother scolding him about how messy it was.
124112.title: Going Home with Cream

1241121.content:
Ash watched as Cream tidied up her room. Once and a while she’d glance over to see where he was. She was thinking the same thing Ash was; and she didn’t want to accidentally step on him either. Oliver walked along a dresser and came upon a Fuzzy slipper. Curious he walked about it. It didn’t seem to belong to Cream. It was much too big.

“Oh, that’s my Mum’s” said Cream glancing over her shoulder “I was using it as a bed for one of my dolls”

This was her mother’s? She must be absolutely enormous! But from what he had heard she seemed to be really nice.
Cream had noticed that Ash probably didn’t know Sonic. His had looked too confused when she showed him the figure of Sonic. Everyone on the planet would probably have recognized Sonic’s likeness immediately but the way he looked at the figure it was like it was seeing for the first time.

She then remembered his question. "What world?" - it didn't leave her head. Did he imply.. he wasn't like.. from town.. he was from.. Somewhere else entirely. She tried to push the thought away but the more she tried and more lost in it. So much so that she then tripped over a stuffed figure lying on the floor falling forward on her face, nearly landing on Ash.

“Whoa! You okay?” Oliver asked.

“Yeah I’m okay.” Said Cream standing back up.
1241121.title: Look about the Room

choices: Ash Decides he wants to ride in the car
12411211.content:
"You know.. about that.. ‘What World’ question? You mean? You're not from here? That might explain.. You know, why you're so tiny."

Before he'd even have the chance to answer she continued "And.. where do you want to sleep... would you like to have a doll bed.. or a doll house? Never mind.. I do not think I'd have anything suitable for your size!"

“So many questions.” Said Ash thinking. He looked up at Cream. “Before I answer your question, answer this one. What is the name of this planet?”

“Name? It’s Mobius of course.”

Ash nodded. “I see. Cream, the world I’m from is Called Earth. How I got here is anyone’s guess. I’ll figure it out later. But, I’m here now. So lets just take things one at a time, lets start with where I’ll sleep tonight. I think anything would do. A sock, even a piece of cloth would do.”

“Okay, I'll get you a sock later. Feel free to sleep in it. I have to finish tidying up first. Would you like to play with me later? I could do whatever you like, but I guess at your size…Hmmm.”

Cream walked over to her shelf and took something down. “I could put you in this remote-controlled toy car. Might be the first time I actually use this thing Tails built for me. But I guess that would be quite dangerous you know?"

She took the car and placed it in front of him.

“Let me think about it, I’ll let you clean up first. Wouldn’t want you to get in trouble with your Mom.” Said Ash “Do you mind if I take a look at this?”

“Sure go right ahead.”

Ash looked about the car. Aside from a more streamline look and an extra two wheels in the back, and of course it was a size or two bigger in scale compared to him, it looked very much like any Earth car he saw everyday. The interior was pretty bare. A seat for a toy four feet taller than himself and that was about it, not even a dash. He looked under the car.

Wow, Ash was amazed at how complex this toy really was, all those small working parts. This Tails knew his craft. Looked like a battery similar to a lithium ion powered it. A flexible antenna was mounted in the back, no doubt picking up signals from the remote.
12411211.title: Cream Asks a Question

124112111.content:
“Cream, how about after your done you take me for a spin around the room?”

An hour later Ash was sitting inside the car wishing for seatbelts. Well, it was too late to back out, and he didn’t want to disappoint Cream who had actually gotten her heart set on driving him around.

“Ready Ash?”

“Ready!” he called out and the car started moving.

It was actually going slower than he had thought it would. He had expected to go 300 kilometres an hour in the car; instead it was traveling at a safer 20. Ash was actually enjoying himself. It was like riding in an amusement park ride. And as it turned out Cream was an excellent driver considering her age. Course she bumped into a few things but she was always quick to apologize and ask if Ash was okay.

There was a knock on the door “Cream, may I come in?”

(Who is it?)

1241121111.title: Tails

1241121112.content:
“Just a sec Mum” Cream turned to Oliver in the car and whispered, “Stay inside”

Cream unlocked the Door and her mother stepped inside. Ash had never in his life thought he’d ever see anyone or anything as tall or as enormous as her. Every step she took sent vibrations threw the car and into Ash. Luckily he was getting use to being around Cream so the sight of her mother wasn’t a complete shock.

“Just wanted to see what you were up do, dearie” said Vanilla. “Oh! You’ve tidied up your room, good for you.” She looked about and saw the car. “Is that the toy Tails made for you?”

Ash froze as Cream’s mother walked over and picked the car up between two fingers. He thought of what he could do, he couldn’t hide and there was no way he was going to jump out, so he stood perfectly still as Vanilla peered into the inside of the car.

“Amazing, he even put a little driver inside.” Said Vanilla as she examined the car. Then She handed the car over to Cream “ Supper’s almost ready. I’ll call you out when it’s done.”

With that she left the room closing the door behind her.

Cream then breathed up: "Phew.. I guess I am lucky she didn't see you move." Cream looked it at Ash. "And basically.. even in there you look totally misplaced. How much did you actually see when you looked forward? I know there's no dash or anything related but... when you sit don't you just look into the foot well area? You were probably also standing on the driver's seat for most of the time to actually see any thing at all.”

“I saw plenty.” Said Ash as he climbed out of the toy and into her hand. “Including your Mom.”

“How did you stay so still? She thought you were a little toy.”

“I was too scared to moved.” Said Oliver.

“Scared? Why would you be scared of my M- Oh…” Cream thought of how Ash saw the world, of course he’d be scared. Her Mom was so much bigger than she was. “Do you find me scary Oliver?”

Ash looked up at Cream. She looked like she was on the verge of tears“ Only at first. Seeing someone your size for the first time is a real shock.” He sat down in her palm and gave it a friendly tap “But I’m not scared of you now. And I’m sure your Mom wouldn’t mind me being here, and I wouldn’t want you to keep a secret from her, but I need more time to get use to everything before you tell her. Okay?”

"Okay. Don't worry about my Mum, she is the nicest mother I can imagine. She can be a bit strict sometimes but I guess she'd immediately accept you around." Cream explained. Putting the toy car on her little table near her bed.

"Guess how I got my Chao..” She said as she hugged Cheese. “Cheese followed me and Mum agreed I may raise him! So I am sure you'd also be welcome here! Of course only if you like to stay." Cream added hopefully.

“I’ll stay, I have nowhere else to go. And it’s been fun” Ash saw a big smile form on Cream’s face “Just think of me as your favourite Martian.”

Cream frowned “ I thought you were from Earth.”

“Oops I forgot, you’ve never seen that program. I’ll have to tell you about it later.”

“Cream! Supper’s ready!”

12411211122.content:
“ You go on ahead. I’ll wait around here for you.”

“Okay,” Cream lowered her hand to her bedroom floor for Ash to climb out “I’ll bring something back for you”

“I’d like that.” Said Ash. “Thank you”

“Back in a bit” with that she left the room with her chao following her. Try as he might, Ash still couldn’t figure out how that creature stayed in the air.

Cream was just walking down with her mother to get something to eat. She was chatting with her and not talking yet about Ash. she blushed a bit thinking ‘His voice sounds male... so would people think my boy-friend would be with me now.. nah, he's so tiny, he couldn't be my boy-friend.. Still, just he looks so adorable!’

While Cream was away, Ash continued looking around the room. The closet door was opened and upon walking closer to it he discovered she had several suits just like the one she was wearing, not a bad idea, that way you didn’t have to think about what to wear, just put the next clean suit on.

He walked up to one of her shoes that were on its side. Since he’d first seen here there was something Ash was curious about. He climbed up into it. The first thing that he noticed was the smell. It wasn’t like human foot smell but more earthly and nowhere near as unpleasant. Walking along the inside he could make out the outline of Cream’s Foot. It would seem that just as her hands were human-like so were her feet.

Climbing out of the shoe he began to have thoughts about them. For some reason he wanted to see what they looked like for himself. But, no, should he even dare to ask? What would she say if he did? He could feel his face going red from embracement just thinking about it.

He heard and felt footsteps.

1241121112212.content:
“Sure.”

For a half an hour Ash and Cream played the Board game. Ash didn’t know the rules that well, which is probably why Cream won every game. Not that he cared, She was having fun, and that’s all that mattered to him. After a while she put the game away and placed Ash on her bed. He heard her footwear slip off. Sitting on her bed, Cream swung her socked feet over and bent her knees so as she sat the soles of her feet were on either side of him.

“Mum doesn’t like me wearing shoes on the bed,” she explained. “Oops, I guess my feet kinda stink.”

Ash sniffed the air. There was indeed a strong sent from her socked feet but nothing that was unbearable. It didn’t smell like humans. It had the smell of stale popcorn.

“It’s not too bad, I’ve smelled worst.” He gave them a quick look over noting the shape of her feet and toes through the cotton cloth of her socks. Ash couldn’t bring himself to ask her. He simply was too shy to tell her he wanted to see more of her feet. Maybe she noticed or maybe she didn’t.

They talked for the next half hour, Cream told Ash about her world, and he told her about his. After a while she began to yawn.

"Time for bedtime .I guess if you aren't tired I could leave the door a slight bit open so you could take a look around if you like!" she offered. “Just look out for Mum.”

Moments later the lights were out. Up in the bed Ash could here Cream sleeping. He though of climbing up there and going under the covers to look at her soles but thought against it. She was after all a growing child and needed her rest. Besides, if she caught him down there he’d be too embarrassed to explain. There was however an alternative, if he was bold enough.

And at that moment he was.

12411211122122.content:
Creeping out of Cream’s bedroom he peered outside into the hall. All was clear. A bit farther down from Cream’s room was another door. Making his way down to it, he crawled under the door. To his delight he’d chosen the right door, he was in her mothers bedroom. She wasn’t there though, that gave him time to look around; and the first thing he saw was a pair of pink fuzzy slippers.

He made a straight line to them.

Starting from the toe of one slipper he climbed up to the mouth of the slipper. As he peered inside, Ash began to hear heavy footsteps approaching. Cream was asleep, so it had to be--

In a panic he jumped into the slipper. Fortunately it was fuzzy on the inside and he didn't hurt himself. He heard the door open.

"Well, finally all work is done. I really should get rid of those shoes!"

Vanilla slipped off her normal shoes - her heels were hurting her from all the walking but she had also gone shopping that day so she needed them as it would look odd for a lady to wear flat shoes.

She then approached the slippers with giant steps and slipped into the first one on her foot. And then into the second, not knowing someone was inside.

Ash cried out as Vanilla slowly slipped her massive socked foot into the slipper. With no other options and knowing he would never make it to the toes section in time, he hoped up and climbed up onto Vanilla’s socked toes as they wiggled and made they’re way into the slipper.

With her slippers on, Vanilla walked out of her bedroom and into the living room to read. Every step she took was a challenge to Ash. He tried to hold onto the cloth of the sock but each time her foot touched the floor he was bounced into the air and had to scramble up onto her foot before she took another step. He wondered how many more times he’d be able to do it before she either stopped walking or he ended up under her socked toes.

Vanilla walked into the living room, Grabbing her favourite book off the shelf she sat down on the couch.

As she began to read she felt something in her right slipper. It was as if it was tighter at her toes. She used the tips of her fingers to press down on the top of the right slipper to sort her toes. After a while everything felt fine and she continued to read.

Ash felt something big press into his back. The next thing he knew he was shoved In between Vanilla’s socked toes. As he was pushed deeper in between them he felt the sock underneath him slip away. It was so dark inside he hadn’t realized he was close to a hole in Vanilla’s sock. He wanted to see Her feet, but he never thought he’d get this close.

As it was he still couldn’t see them, but he could sure feel them pressed all around him in a firm but surprisingly gentle embrace. Maybe being stuck between her toes wasn’t so bad after a---

He thought too soon as he slipped down underneath the tips of her big and second toes. Detecting his presence either aware or unaware, her toes begin to explore the little object under them.

Ash tried to sit up but was quickly shoved back into the sock by one of Vanilla’s huge toes, it slowly began to rubbing into him feeling every micro inch of his body, but not hurting him at all. With one free arm and hand he reached up and touched the underside of the toe on top of him.

He could feel friction ridges, not unlike a human but at the same time very different. The skin was soft to the touch and smelled of some type of lotion that wasn’t known to him. Before he realized what he was doing he lifted his head up and kissed the surface of the toe. The only response he got was Vanilla’s toe continual rubbing. Then, the toe was off him, only for her huge big toe to take its place. Under this huge digit Oliver soon hard to breath, he struggled against it but it was hopeless. A hundred people his size couldn’t budge it.

Although Vanilla was completely unaware of the human which was by now in her sock, she did feel a tickling sensation under her toes. She couldn't resist giggling as she wiggled her toes over whatever was in her sock.

"I might have sand or something in my socks!" she figured.

Finally, and mercifully the big toe lifted off Ash enough to allow him to wiggle free. He heard a giggle from Vanilla above. She felt him but hadn't realized what he was. He didn't want to get her attention, he was still scared of what she might do, but if he didn't she'd crush him without even realizing it. In the pitch darkness Ash felt around until he was where he thought her big and second toes were and squeezed his way in between them. 1241121112212212.content:
"Mmmmmm, maybe I should take a bath. Wash all that sand off before I go to bed."

"What! N-"

That's all he had a chance to say before Vanilla stood up and began to walk again.Vanilla walked up to the bathroom. Putting the plug in the tub she turned the water on and sitting on the toilet removed her slipper. Light illuminated Ash’s world and he could see what Vanilla’s foot looked like, but before he could inspect them more closely Vanilla laid her feet socks and all over the bathtub. Wanting to make sure all the sand would land in the bathtub so she wouldn't have to clean it up later she removed the socks and shook them out so all sand would fall out. She added some bathing soap and nice bubbles began form. While the tub finished filling up she undressed, by the time she had removed her cloths the tub was full and ready. Before she dipped into the tub she paused and giggled when she saw Cream's bathing duck.

"Hehe.. should I take it in or not?" she asked herself.

While Ash could swim a bit he’d never been in such deep water before, it was like swimming in an ocean. Trying to stay afloat in a froth of big bubbles was a real challenge, but at least the water was warm. Towering above him completely nude Vanilla peered into the Tub, but he was far too busy trying to stay afloat to enjoy the view.

“I think I will,” he heard Vanilla say. Then something big and yellow splashed down close to him, through soap filled eyes he saw that it was a yellow rubber duck. Swimming toward it, he managed to get a hold of it. Looking upward again he watched as Vanilla swung her foot over and stepped into the tub. As she settled down into it the wake of her movement created giant waves in the tub. One particular huge wave threw him up onto the rubber duck.

Coughing up soapy water and wiping the soap from his eyes, he looked around. The duck was floating in the middle of the tub. Vanilla’s whole body up past her breasts was under the water. She sighed her eyes closed.

“Hmm, this is so relaxing,” Vanilla, sighed. She sank deeper into the water causing more waves.

Opening her eyes again she eyed the Rubber Duck playfully. With a wave of her hand through the water, she made a wave that pushed the duck towards the end of the tub. Looking into the soapy water he saw something big coming up. Vanilla’s feet broke the surface and grasped the duck with her toes. She played with the rubber duck, rolling it between her feet as closed her eyes to relax a bit more. The bathing soap formed a more and more big bubble bath with towers of white bubbles blocking Ash's view, not that it mattered because it was all he could do to stay on the duck.
1241121112212212.title: Vanilla decides to take a Bath

12411211122122122.content:
After twenty minutes Vanilla climbed up out of the tub not only causing more waves in her wake, but because she still had a grip on the duck it was pulled momentarily under the water. Ash was back in the water. The duck bobbed back up but before he could even try to get back on Vanilla plucked it out of the water. Dripping with water and humming to herself she put Cream’s duck away and reached back into the water. Ash knew right away what she planned to do.

“N-NOOOOOOO!”

The sound of the water draining grounded out Ash’s terrified screams. Vanilla put a robe on and slipped her slippers back on. She looked back at the tub to make sure the water was draining out and left the bathroom. As Ash was pulled down the drain all he could think of was poor Cream. 134322.content:
Before Ash opened his eyes he knew something was wrong. The Air smelled of wood. Not the wood of a forest but the wood of a cabin. The ground felt hard and grooved. He opened his eyes, Blinked, Then sat up and questioned whether or not he was still unconscious and dreaming. What he was seeing was impossible, but there it was.

He was in a hallway. A vast wooden dimly lite hallway. Beside him was a potted plant that towered over him like a red wood tree. He could make out pictures on the walls, but instead of people he saw anthropomorphic rabbits. Maybe they were gag pictures like those dogs playing poker, but something told him that wasn't the case. Once again he questioned whether or not he was dreaming. He felt the floor he was laying on. It felt real, more real than any dream he'd ever had. With his brain still trying to grasp what he was seeing, he got to his feet. He was in the center of the hallway, with the walls on either side reaching up to a ceiling hundreds of feet above.

As he tried to decide what to do next, he felt a tremor through the floor. Then another stronger than before. He'd seen enough Godzilla and Jurassic Park movies to know what that was. He began to hear thundering footfalls, they sounded muffled like someone walking without shoes. There was a bright flickering light coming from behind. Turning into the direction of this new source of light his brain almost short circuited at what he saw. It was a giant anthropomorphic rabbit. Hundreds of feet tall at least, The giant was holding an enormous candle. The foot falls were slow but steady. Ash blinked. He knew this creature.

It was
134322.title: Night of the Lepus

1343311.content:
You woke up under the taller section of a ceiling of some kind. Sitting up to readjust yourself, you could see a standard living room in the distance, TV and all, except... the room seemed to much bigger than a normal one should be.

The next thing you knew, the "ceiling" had slid away from you, revealing to what it really was; the underside of a giant pink heel. You were stupefied, questions immediately piling up in your mind about the situation as a whole.
But you had noticed whoever was wearing the shoe was humming. The further up you looked, the crazier things became. The shoe's owner was a anthropomorphic female dog, with a pink turtleneck sweater, large hoop earrings, and an incredibly sturdy winged hairstyle. From your point of view, she appeared to be folding laundry, and rather quickly too.


You thought to yourself. She seems to be in a happy mood. Maybe she knows how this happened to me? You looked around, and there was no one else to reach out to. (Not that you could get very far anyway)

So, you took a deep breath and walked over to her large feet. They were so glossy, you could nearly see your reflection in them. They were surprisingly easy to climb, though.
Just as you had pulled yourself up onto her foot itself, it began to move. You hung on to the edge of the heel’s opening, feeling your stomach sink as the shoe traveled up, then down, stopping with a thump. The impact upon landing had bounced you off the foot and onto the toe of the heel. Gazing up at this giantess, you saw her looking down in your direction and froze. Her massive hand reached down, seemingly about to pick you up. Had she noticed you?
1343311.title: Peg

13433111.content: She looked at you and said....
13433111.title: She had!

choices: Ash makes it under the couch just in time
Peg pauses to pick up the TV remote off the coffee table
13433112.content:
The fingers closed around something to the left of Ash. It wasn't until it was lifted high into the air that he could see it was a sock. The Giantess rose to full height, turned and walked away. Ash she casually walked out of his sight her foot falls caused tremors through the floor. As she left, Ash took a look at the rather large, even larger now, posterior.

'Gluteus Maximus' he thought.

Putting aside the notion that such a giant creature couldn't live, and his current location, Ash wondered how big she really was. Hundreds of feet tall for sure. He remembered his uncle's train set. The figures it had come with were very small. HO scale, his uncle had called it. From what he could tell, he was about the size of those figures, that made him just under a half inch tall. No wonder she hadn't seen him. What would she have done if she had? Would she have been kind and helped, or would he have ended up crushed like a bug under that massive pink shoe?

The tremors began to intensify again. Either she was coming back, or someone else was showing up.

Looking around, Ash made a dash for the closest shelter, the sofa. It might've been the closest but it was still a distance away, and even though he was running as fast as he could he didn't know if it would be fast enough.

Peg was in a good mood. For once, her Husband of twenty years wasn't scheming, scamming, and overall making an ass of himself. The laundry was in the wash, the kids were in school, she had some time for herself. Grabbing a light sack from the kitchen she made her way back to the living room to watch her favorite Soap Opera. As she entered the living room and made her way to the couch, her eyes didn't look down at the floor. If she had, she might've noticed the speck fleeing for his life. She might've paused to examine him further, maybe even been kind to him, but she hadn't glanced down. Her foot falls made it more difficult for tiny legs to run, while her larger and curvy legs closed the gap between them much quicker.
13433112.title: Unnoticed.
