13433222222222211.content:
With a hard plop on the steel covered ground Ash slowly comes to as he's not only incredibly tiny but surrounded by massive objects all the size of the Empire State Building itself!

"Whoa what happened? Where the hell am I? And what's with all the high tech stuff? Am I in the future?" He wondered out loud as everything did indeed look futuristic then he saw the date and timeline he was in flash across one of the computer screens from above.

"It's the year 2005 so this must be still the present era I think but still this does look a bit familiar where have I seen this before......." Then he noticed more of the giant computer screens with various people in colorful costumes fighting numerous threats all around the world and slowly it dawned on him

"Hold on that's Superman fighting Lex Luthor and that's the Flash battling Captain Cold and isn't that Green Lantern aka John Stewart fighting Sinestro? Wait a sec! This...this it can't be! But I'm in the original Justice League Unlimited cartoon show!" He gasped out loud actually shaking his head to clear it and pinching himself to try and wake up but he wasn't dreaming this was in fact for real!

"This is absoutely crazy! I can't believe I'm in the Justice League Watchtower!" As he now knew exactly where he was "Strange it looks a lot different from the comics....so I'm in a space ship crawling with gigantic super heroes. I wonder whose left here in the Watchtower who might be able to help me.........." But his thoughts were cut off as he heard loud powerful tremors echoing throughout the main deck of the satellite and glanced up BOOM,BOOM,BOOM!

Ash's whole jaw dropped at the sight of the towering greatest super heroine known to man,the Amazon Princess herself Wonder Woman: http://r.search.aol.com/_ylt=AwrEwM67CdB... stood like Godzilla towering over him speaking into her ear piece commlink

"I understand Jonn but I wish there was something I could do instead of being stuck here on monitor duty!" She complained

"Whoa! It...its Wonder Woman herself!" Ash cried out in utter amazement as she was both incredibly gorgeous and terrifying at the same time!

"She's the perfect person to help me out!" As he pondered how to get her attention finally he decided to.......
13433222222222211.title: Justice League Unlimted

choices: She gives him a tour of the Watchtower
She takes him to her room and asks more questions
134332222222222113.content:
As she continued talking to her friend J'onn J'onzz aka the Martian Manhunter and watching the computer screens, Princess Diana, a.k.a Wonder Woman, couldn't help but think that her talents were being misused currently as she scanned screen after screen, surely she could be doing something out in the field? But sadly that was not the cause. Sighing did she look down and...spotted something. Or more importantly, someone.

Ash, staring at the immense beauty called Wonder Woman couldn't help but break from his short gawking affair as her serene eyes looked at him, directly. "What in the world is that?" She asked, her voice booming as Ash put quickly together she was referring to him. He gulped, not wanting to move, but not wanting to seem suspicious either as Wonder Woman walked towards him, making powerful and massive earthquakes with her red boots that shook his own being as he lost his footing and flew up into the sky as well.

Hearing this, did Wonder Woman react, catching the poor Ash in mid-air as she brought him up to her face. "So sentient, huh? Okay little boy who are you and why are you in the Justice League Watchtower?" She asked as her massive face filled his view,her stunning diamond blue eyes studying his every movement he could only stare in wonder as one of his favorite super-heroines was in front of him, and enormous of all that. "So is screaming all you can do? It's alright no harm will harm to you." She said calmly, teasing him a bit as she was now dealing with matters of breaking in to the Watchtower.

"Wha-oh, no, no, no,Er Ash,my name is Ash and somehow I woke up barely a inch tall and here in the Watchtower.....it-it's the truth honest please believe me!" Ash cried scared out of his wits after processing her words very carefully, "I....assure you...I can do more than just scream." He said very nervously as he was now standing in her palm, the size of most likely a parking lot as he felt very, very tiny in comparison.

Diana, now taking a keen interest in the intruder continued the conversation, "Hmmmmmmmm you seem to be trustworthy but I'm not 100% sure but anyway I'm Diana but you probably know me as Wonder Woman. " she said extending her unoccupied index finger to shake the little man's hand and giving him a smile "And you are... your name is Ash you said?"

" Yeah just Ash," He said as he took the finger's tip with his hand and shook it, "And well...I think you can understand my situation currently." He was hopeful that at least she would hear him out.

"Well I'm not so sure about that," Wonder Woman said as she leaned on a nearby desk as she looked at him with unflinching yet calm eyes. "What I see currently is a potential spy. For who? I'm not sure, but whatever the case you're in my hands now." Ash was speechless as it never occurred to him that this could happen, suddenly being accused of espionage or worse.

"But I'm not lying!" He yelled out to her and she arched a eyebrow "Sorry but please Wonder Woman you must believe me I'm no spy."

"Prove it to me then and I'll believe you." She said calmly.

"Well I was just at home watching television, when all of a sudden there was a bright flash, and I ended up down on the floor and I-I ended up here honest." He puffed quite quickly as he gasped for breath. Diana still wasn't convinced as she still wasn't sure she could believe him. Unbuckling her belt from her hip, did she bring it up to him.

"If what you say is true," She spoke, making a small knot and tied it around him faster than he could blink as the rope was around his waist. "Then the lasso will tell. Unless you have something to hide." He gulped as he took a deep breath and spoke.

"I swear that what I say is only the truth." He shivered a bit as the lasso glowed it's usual golden light only to dissipate within seconds.

"Alright," Wonder Woman said as she untied him and put it back around her waist "I think I believe you now."
134332222222222113.title: She actually looks down and spots him

As you struggle to open your eyes, you heard something like "Come on wake up shrimp,all of our feet are waiting" and "It's going to be awesome having a little guy to help us around,and do our homework."

After you what seem like a eternity,you finally manage to open your eyes. What you saw would change a your fate quite abit..

"Well Ash,you just having a very realistic dream" you said to yourself in totally not terrified voice as you see a very happy ____ greeting you from precious slumber.

Who are they?
1343322222222222212221.title: Isn't children wonderful?

choices: ...the older sisters gets to be first.
...the younger sisters gets to be first.

"Well Ashy, this is no dream" the pretty little princess wearing pink chimed,while looking you like a peasant.The other five girls(yep..there's six of them) giggled in a admittedly cute way.

"Well wha-what will you sweet you-ng girls wan-want from me"You stuttered,while staring at..your new masters.

"All we want is someone to talk to,help with our chores and homework,and play ga-"And to someone pamper our feet!" The sporty girl loudly and quite happily said while cutting he Goth girl off. And the word "feet" entices a blush on your face..which they all notice.

"Heh,You got the same "likening" that Me and Luan have.Eh shortstuff" the sporty girl teased,while also having a blush,while having mischievous and perverted grin on her freckled face. While "Luan" only said I-I don't know what you're talking about Lynn... the now named Luan muttered while annoyed..while also having a blush. Which her..sisters all laugh at her reaction.

While shorty,you're going love the face that all loud-kids have big feet. We get it from our mom." Lynn teases Ash while she winked at him.
.
"But first,who gets the first crack at ya?" Lynn said while she and her sisters thought the same thing. After a minute they decide that..
13433222222222222122211.title: Six sisters and One little teenager

134332222222222221222111.content:
"Me,Luan,and Lucy getting to be first." Lynn Jr. teased the blushing boy,as she affectionately pets his head.

The young girls give their discourse very loudly. But Lynn Jr. sternly shut them up. While Luan looks like she's going to get a heart-attack,and Lucy had a small smile.

"Alright whoever wins get to have fun with Ashy." Lynn happily explain to her two sisters."The loser gets to be second,Lucy gets to be third and so forth."

Lucy made a gloomy sigh as a eager Lynn and nervous as hell Luan plays a game of rock,paper,and scissors. Ash mentally prepares himself for the incoming trials ahead.

Who won the game?
134332222222222221222111.title: Being older means being first.

choices: Only rub and knead them.It's the safe way.
Licking and Kissing never hurt anyone. Besides they won't know.
1343322222222222212221111.content:
The sport loving tomboy won the game against the bucktoothed girl by a landslide.And judging from her aggressive as hell cheering, she must really love to win.

Lynn turns to look at you,with the excitement and playfulness of a adorable kitten…that's mixed with the viciousness and gleefulness of...an hungry shark. Her little snickers brought many great chills in Ash's miniscule bobes.

Wordlessly,she took off those red fluffy slippers, and her long musclar feet wiggled in their newfound freedom. But suddenly she tossed her footwear to Luan, which the older girl fumbly caught.

"Consider that as a consolation prize big sister!" Lynn light-heartedly mocked the wide eyed clown with a oh so sweet smile. Her smile gains in power as she sees her blush and her trembling mouth.

Lynn finally turned to the stony older teen with a big smile as she eagerly mush her hard left sole against his face.The other sisters look at the spectacle in awe and wonder. Even Lynn looks very unsure and almost fearful doing this.And unknown to Ash, his body is tickling. But when she began to hear back from coughing and gagging from Ash, she quickly remove her foot away from him.

"S-Sorry about that….but these twelve and halfs can get very ripe."Lynn proudly "apologize" in her usual tone, but her sisters and the boy notice the not so hidden timidness and bashfulness.

Ash can definitely agree to them. But the powerful sour cheesy vingar funk were oddly appealing to the teen, despite it burning his eyes and lungs.And hints of earthiness increase it's attractiness to him.

A pink blush appeared on the tomboy's face as she flex her long toes,and showing off her chipped brown painted toes.The girl looked at Ash…with a odd look.So this is how Leni feels like..

'Oh my God..she looks absolutely cute.' Ash thought as he look at the girl who is obilivously trying to look tough and mighty. And the way the small freckles "merged" the blush was made her more adorable. But he was at least three or four years older than her!!

"Pamper them..I had a LONG day at practice." Lynn sternly demanded in a attempt to show her authority.She crosses her soles almost shyly.

With many eyes on him,he shakily approach...those cute feet.He could just rub them,or…he could have some fun with his task. But doing the latter could go wrong…in so many ways.

What does Ash decides to do?
1343322222222222212221111.title: Lynn's greatest challenge...

choices: Lynn takes him someplace private to continue
Lynn steps on him to test his durability
Lynn kicks him into the crowd
13433222222222222122211111.content:
Ash was a bit reluctant to get started. In spite of Lynn's threatening posture (which he at least saw through for now), the other sets of eyes on him made this all feel awkward. "A-HEM!" Lynn removed all subtly from her methods as her usual brash attitude was quietly returning. Worried that he might be testing the tomboy's patience, he finally reached out and pressed his arms into the flesh. Almost immediately they slid on the sweaty surface. Figures. Though honestly this shouldn't be surprising given her lifestyle. Lynn felt a strange sensation as Ash slid along her sole. She managed to retain her poker face but only just barely. She heard Ash whimper up a sorry as he got back up to his feet preparing to do this for real. Lynn realized this and braced herself.

Ash started rubbing his hand along the sweaty flesh once more, the sweat hit him almost as hard as the rank odor did. Droplets slid off her toes and onto his head as he kept this up, rubbing both arms back and forth. With each passing second, the smell and taste of her huge soles seemed to cover his entire form. Ash were practically marked by them after a few minutes. God only knows if you could ever wash the stink out of him.

Meanwhile Lynn was biting her lip as you got to work. Tiny or not, Ash really seemed to know what to do down there. She was definitely planning to make this a part of her daily routine. But it still felt kinda weird. Some odd awkward feeling. She wasnt sure what to do. Would the others see it as a weakness. No. She couldn't let that happen. Still, she couldn't be her usual rough self just yet. She had no clue how durable or fragile Ash was. And she had no intention of giving him up either. This was a rather interesting pickle. But Lynn's brain started to process it as another challenge, and she could NOT turn down or lose a challenge. She HAD to conquer it. But what will she do.
13433222222222222122211111.title: Lightly Pampering Lynn

choices: ....the twins with big grins on their faces.
...the Goth and a creepy smile on her face
134332222222222221222111113.content:
Dozens of curious eyes stared at the diligent boy as he rubbed the hardened yet slippery soles. They watched his minuscule fingers gingerly caress her dusty mid-step. His torso practically grinding against her heel.

"I'm honestly surprised Ash is still rubbing it. I would have thought he would have run for dear life while gasping for air, or just plain knocked out. Since it's Lynn we are talking about." The girly half of the twins chirped as she watched on in sheer amazement of the resilience of the
boy to put up with such a thing. Her other sisters seem to agree on the fact.

"Ash's dedication is like a beacon of dim light in the foul abyss that is Lynn's feet." The goth proclaimed with a dark tone. The other children also nodded in agreement.

Ash's head was swirling like a tornado as Lynn's aroma played with his senses like a smelling his neighbor's freshly baked blueberry pie. With a certain body-part and hormones working in tandem with his loopy state of mind. Ash did the unthinkable, he starts to kiss her foot. Every peck brought dirt and salty sweat in his mouth, which sled down his throat. The audience around them were shaped at the new turn of events. Lynn's blush deepened as she felt a new sensation.…and judging from the peanut gallery's faces, Ash was really doing something.

Lynn tilted her head forward, only to find the boy…kissing..her. Well..it is only her feet, but it stills counts as her first kiss. A small but strange smile appeared on her freckled face, who know she would have gotten such a willing playmate? And not to mention the fun things they will do together to have in the near future.

But sadly Lynn noticed the gawking and sighed. She going to have fun with Ash in private. With a swift kick, she punted the boy into the crowd.

"You guys knock yourselves out." Lynn shrugged as she sat on the couch, and put her feet on the armrest.

"Um..what about the order of who gets a turn."

"Forget about it, whoever gets him first, gets to play with him." Lynn rolled her eyes as she rubbed the balls of her feet together. A clear blush is on her face, she clearly mimicking the earlier feeling with little success.

Her sisters minus Luan shrugged up and made smiles of varying shades and degrees. Seeing that the little helper is just so eager to please them…has awoken something in them.

As Ash slowly starts to get his bearings, he just realizes what he did. Embarrassment and shock are clearly written on the poor confused teen's face. Soon something is looming over his tiny form. Ash turns his head upwards, only to find…
134332222222222221222111113.title: Thrown into the lions' den.

1343322222222222212221111131.content:
Still dizzy from completing the task you were assigned by Lynn (and from the painful kick she gave you afterwards) you failed to immediately noticed a very large shadow obscuring your whole being. However, as your blurry vision began to clear, you looked up to notice the two blonde twin giantesses who were staring down at you with grins so wide you could clearly see their lack of front teeth.

"Princesses first!" the one wearing a pink gown and a tiara smugly proclaimed while holding out her gloved arm; only when you looked back and noticed the goth rearing back while letting out a 'Sigh' you realized that she was stopped while attempting to get you as well.

Lucy's pause allowed Lana to lean over and get a hold of your body, which traveled far up in the air as the giant kid rose back up to her original position.

You felt an ant under her gaze and, judging from her expression, you judged she was the kind of person that liked to crush ants for the fun of it. The look that screamed 'this is going to be fun' she was giving you did nothing to ease your nervousness.

"This little doll's coming to our room," Lola declared while shooting you a predatory grin, one that reminded you of a tiger ready to leap on its defenseless prey,
"We're gonna have a lot of fun."

The fact she called you 'doll', the tone she gave you such title with and her grin only made your heart sink, and you feared that these two giant kids could easily kill you if they weren't careful enough.

You couldn't think to yourself for long though; Lola hastily grabbed her twin sister's arm and began walking out of the living room, beginning to walk on a staircase.

Once upstairs, the hyperactive twins ran all the way straight to her room and shut the door.

You got to take a look around: the room looked pretty large, but its contents couldn't conflict more.

On one side, the room looked like it was made for a member of the royal family; the other side looked like a jungle, you judged from the bed being untidy... and from the rather large snake that rested on top of it, curled on itself.

You wondered what such animal was doing in the room of two six year olds, but you weren't left too much time to think about it.

"Welcome to our room, little guy," the kid who held you eagerly spoke.

You turned back in the cupped palms of Lana to face the enthusiastic twins, who were once again grinning down at you.

"Cut the formalities Lana, let's give this little guy the greatest tea party ever!" Lola spoke in poorly contained excitement.

It was fitting, she thought, a beautiful princess such as herself deserved nothing more than a tiny servant such as the little guy who stumbled into the Loud House.

You guessed you should have seen this coming, judging from this spoiled girl's looks and behavior.

Her twin sister didn't seem to share her opinion though.

"No way!" she protested,
"He's not doing some dumb tea party, we're gonna play together first!"

While pronouncing those words, Lana's mind flashed with memories of what Lynn had the tiny teen she was holding do and blushed at the thought. She wondered what kind of things you could do for her... or which places you could fit in...

The younger twin glared at her sibling, who returned the glare.

You felt the tension between the two. growing so thick you could cut it.

And then, inevitably...

"He's playing with me first!" Lola screamed.
"No, me first!" Lana countered.

Right then, the two began arguing violently, their high-pitched infantile voices threatening to burst both your eardrums.

Mercifully, the argument stopped soon; sadly, it was because the two of them started a fight.

While still held in Lana's fist, you were unfortunately pulled into the fight as well and began feeling nauseous, especially when Lola jumped onto her twin and the two began rolling onto the carpeted floor.

You felt sick, but struggled to keep your latest meal where it was.

"GIRLS!" you screamed instead causing both twins to stop instantly; Lana had Lola on top of herself and was ready to deliver a kick while the second twin was pulling her sister's pigtails. In all of this, you were being held in between a bare hand and a pink-glowed one.

"Wouldn't it be better if I..." you had to pause to swallow a lump in your throat,
"... If I picked who gets me first?"

Seeing no way out of their whims, you thought this was a reasonable agreement.

Lola raised an eyebrow.

"That's a..."

"That's actually a good idea!" Lana interrupted with a smile, causing the other twin to glare down at her.

You sighed, afraid they were going to start fighting again.

Luckily, such occurrence didn't come.

"... Hurry up and pick already. You don't make a princess wait, you know." Lola spoke.

You felt amazed, were they actually listening to you?

Your mind raced as you thought that if you picked a twin, the other was going to make it pay during her turn.

You picked Lana, you were sure the 'princess' would want your head; you picked Lola, you feared Lana was going to feed you to the snake that was on her bed.

Whatever the case, you had to pick one and hope the other wasn't going to be mad.
1343322222222222212221111131.title: Twin rivalry

choices: Lola stood up, "You will become my cushion!"
Lola kicked off her shoes, "You're going under my feet, where you belong!"
Lola just tossed you to Lana, "You can have him!"
13433222222222222122211111312.content:
Ultimately, your choice fell on the girl in the pink gown, who previously, openly declared her intentions and what use she was going to make of you.

And, even though being called a doll felt utterly degrading, you thought it was better than facing whatever unpredictable and dangerous the other twin could have in store for you.

You could definitely survive a tea party.

"I think I'll play with... um..." you looked at the girl you intended to go with, who adopted a big grin on her face.

"Lola." she answered, placing a name on herself while snatching you from her twin, whose face looked much more different.

"Well, my name is Lana," she introduced herself by prodding the middle of her chest with her thumb, shooting you a glare as well as an expression of disbelief,
"And I can't believe you really wanna do some dumb tea party! You're a guy, too!" she complained.

You offered a shrug.

"See? He wants to play with me, so shut up already!" said the other twin with a surprising amount of authority in her voice. You felt it, this wasn't going to be enjoyable at all. It was fine though, you just needed it to be painless.

Lana sighed.

"Fine." she gave up,
"I'll just wait for my turn... just hurry up."

With that, Lana walked over to her bed and jumped right next to the snake who abruptly woke up and crawled under her bed, startled. The tomboy little girl shot you a disappointed expression while Lola grinned smugly and walked over a tea table, which was conveniently already prepared.

It was as one would imagine it, a pink child's table with little chairs that had stuffed animals sitting on them with toy cups in front of them.

Soon, you were set among the other toys, on your own chair, but there was an evident problem: you didn't even go up to the top of the table. The stuffed bear sitting beside you was probably several times your current height.

"Um... looks like we've got a bit of a problem..." Lola pointed out while a burst of laughter came from the other side of the room, causing her to growl.

Annoyed by the sound of her older twin's laughter, Lola grabbed a tale book from nearby, lifted you up from your chair, placed the book on it and set you back on it with enough strength to make your body shiver. The objective was fulfilled though: you could finally see the upper part of the table.

"There! May this tea party begin!" Lola exclaimed cheerfully, grabbing a tea pot from the table and beginning to tilt it into one a 'guest's' cup. Surprisingly, the amber liquid came for real and filled cup after cup with brown liquid.

You neared your head to your cup, which was absurdly big for you, and gave it an experimental sniff: indeed, it was tea. It was cold though. Who knew how much time it had been in the tea pot.

Lola reached forward and promptly took a sip, uncaring of the liquid being cold.

"Ah, there we go!" she exclaimed, putting her cup back, her gaze going from doll to doll,
"Everyone, I'd like you to meet our new guest: Ash!"

You huffed and put your elbow on the table, hand on your cheek while the blonde giantess began talking to her dolls (you included), as if she was speaking to an actual crowd, but with only one listener in reality... not that you were listening too much though.

"Oh God, am I actually doing this?" you muttered under your breath.

To think just yesterday you were home, studying for a test... and now you were here, pretending to be listening to a giant six year old while her twin patiently waited for you to be done which, you hoped, was gonna happen soon.

How did you even get here, you wondered, because this clearly wasn't your home or your neighborhood. But more importantly, why were you tiny? And why did these girls seem so calm about it? And how many more of them were there?

"Hey Lols! Your 'guest' looks bored out of his skull!" Lana chimed from her bed after what seemed an eternity, but was in reality just ten minutes after the start of this torture.

Lola growled, then looked at you.

"Is something wrong?" she addressed you with a glare.

You sighed.

"I'm sorry, but I don't think I can't do this," you replied, trying to sound sorrowful but only managing to sound bored,
"That's just... pointless! I'm bored!" you blurted out, thinking that Lola would understand. She was just six after all!

Bad mistake.

Lola's face immediately displayed anger. Usually, an angry six year old little girl would look adorable; this one angry six year old little girl looked frightening, and not just because she was huge compared to you.

"Rude! Is that anyway to talk to your beautiful princess? Apologize!" she exclaimed.

You felt a knot in your stomach and your mouth was faster than your brain,

"I am so so sorry princess Lola, I beg for your forgiveness." you blurted out, before blushing and looking at yourself, wondering in which dark corner of your mind you've found those words. Were you even apologizing? What happened to your dignity?

On her bed, Lana leaned forward, eager to see what happened next. She sure didn't envy the tiny teen sitting in front of her twin, but she felt like he kind of deserved it for picking Lola first.

"That's better." Lola spoke to you, filling you with relief... which was drained along with the color from your face as she spoke her next sentence,
"But I think a punishment is needed. I can't let such act of rudeness go unpunished after all."

You felt your heart pounding your chest.

"P... Punishment...?" you stuttered breathlessly, wondering what this girl could come up with.

Some dangerous kiddie game? She didn't look like the average six years old to you...

"Exactly. You're gonna get what you deserve!" Lola exclaimed.
13433222222222222122211111312.title: Princess' playtime

choices: Lola couldn't take any more,and her mom comes in.
Like a good twin, Lana helps her!
Lola doubles down! She will not lose!
134332222222222221222111113122.content:
With a hmph, Lola kicked off her shoes, "You're going under my feet, where you belong!"

Her chubby toes made creases on her fat soles. Showing the bright pink toenails. The quality of it was....very impressive. Like a professional salon worker just did her nails.

"Just...What?" You gulp as you blushed at see cute...no spoiled princess's feet. Instantly you remembered the spunky and adorable Lynn and her own feet. But the tomboy was definitely around your age, perhaps a year older or younger than you.

But Lola is six years old, and you don't want to do anything like that to her. Buy immediately Lola's grin widen at your uncomfortable expression and blush. Even Lana giggled at it, not truly knowing the reason behind such action.

Soon both of her soles sandwiched you. Your blush deepened as felt the stupidly softness of her skin. Your nose flared as the pleasantly sweet array of strawberries and bubblegum greeted you. An admittedly great change from disorienting foot-funk of Lynn. But your body defiantly wiggled and squirm against your warm prison. Hoping to worm out of ot. Causing Lola fidget and made her feet hold on tighter. She bit her lips as she tries to contain her growing laughing.

What happens next?
134332222222222221222111113122.title: Today just isn't your day.

choices: It was Lynn, wanting another turn with you
It was... Luan? What was she up to?
It was Lucy, wanting her own turn with you
1343322222222222212221111131222.content:
Lola tried to keep herself from laughing from the tickling sensation you were giving her; her reddened cheeks puffed out, her mouth struggled to not let laughter escape.

In the meantime, you fought as hard as you could to get free from your fleshy prison which, as pleasantly smelling as it was, was growing quite tight around you.

You spread your limbs in an attempt to push the two big soles back, growing annoyed as the time you spent in between them grew prolonged and your embarrassment grew stronger, like the blush on your cheeks.

While all of this happened, Lana watched in amusement while sitting on the very edge of her bed.

"Wow Lols, he's really putting up a fight!" the elder twin exclaimed with naïve cheerfulness.

"Shut... Shut up, Lana!" Lola panted, trying to keep her tiny 'prisoner' where he was, but finding it quite hard to do so: the little guy was a fighter.

Maybe that was why he was able to resist Lynn's own feet for that long, the young girl mused.

The spoiled titan was about to give in and let go, when Lana decided that this was fun and that she wanted to join in as well.

With a swift leap from her bed to the carpeted floor, the older twin made her way to where her sister was and kicked off her shoes in no time flat.

"Mind if I join in this?" she chimed.

Lola growled.

"If you think I'm letting your stinky feet get anywhere near my perfect nails-" she began, but was interrupted by a grinning Lana,

"Do you really wanna lose to a little guy?" she asked.

Lola groaned in response.

"... Fine." she agreed after a moment of hesitation, before she too got a smirk on her face as she looked at your current prison.

Then, all of a sudden she... let go.

Your body was relieved of the pressure and your nose inhaled fresh air again.

You dizzily took in as much air as you could. Sadly, it wasn't that much, because after just a second after you were freed, you were sandwiched in between two feet again.

Initially, you believed that Lola was repeating what she had been doing so far, but you realized you were wrong: this time, the feet weren't assaulting your sides, but were instead in front and behind you. One of them was the same from before, but the other was different.

The smell coming from it was truly hideous, and it stung your nose, burning your nostrils and slowly working it's way down to your lungs; its skin, unlike Lola's, was rougher, and it rubbed off against your back.

Your only supposition was that the other twin, Lana, had decided to 'aid' her sister in punishing you.

The more the merrier, you sourly thought as you resumed struggling against both feet, trying to make the part.

Once it happened... you weren't sure what you were going to do, as you were powerless against these giant kids, but you didn't care. All you needed to do was get away from their feet before they became more creative on how to use them.

As for the gigantic pair of sisters, they giggled at unison.

"He's really squirming there!" Lana laughed,
"That ti-ti-ckles! Hehehaha!"

By this time, Lola too was laughing. So was this what Lynn felt like earlier? Because it sure felt good.

"Hey Lana, I have an idea!" Lola chimed.

You heard that, and didn't like it one bit. You liked it even less when a second pair of feet joined in the 'party', mashing you from all sides.

Your nose was begging for mercy as it was assaulted by pungent and pleasant smells, your body smashed by soft and rough skin.

Soon enough, your strength began to wane, and your struggles started to cease until you tired yourself out and stopped without accomplishing any actual progress.

The twins noticed your lack of struggling and grinned to each other, giving you one last, painful squeeze with their feet before releasing you, letting you fall on the floor.

The enemy was defeated.

Your beaten body was shaken as air traveled to your lungs, which you greedily filled with big gulps of air.

"That was fun!" Lana exclaimed, eyeing you with a big smile; Lola smirked.
"Yeah! Guess I can forgive your rudeness after all, this had been fun!" she agreed.

You didn't. Not at all, and were starting to reconsider the whole 'feet thing'. Next time you saw Lynn, you weren't going to be so happy, you knew.

"What was that!?" you exclaimed, both annoyed and scared,
"You could've hurt me real bad!"

"Oh, silence! You were very rude, you know, you did deserve a punishment for insulting a beautiful princess such as myself." Lola retorted in a scolding tone.

"And besides," Lana chimed in, rising to her full height which, from your small one, was very impressive,
"Didn't you enjoy doing this with Lynn? This wasn't any different, was it?"

You blushed.

"That means nothing..." you muttered in embarrassment.

"Whatever," Lola spoke again,
"Now, on to the next game!"

You perked up; so did Lana.

But, before you could question what 'game' she was talking about, the sound of a door opening caught your attention, as well as the attention of the giant twins.

You, along with them, looked at the doorway, only the see the door opening indeed, letting a certain sister walk inside...
1343322222222222212221111131222.title: Twin help

choices: How about a no...this girl is too creepy for him
He is too far deep in the rabbit hole to quit now...
1343322222222222212221111132.content:
...the Goth and a creepy smile was her face. Faintly he can see her bright emerald eyes looking down upon. It was honestly giving him the willies. A pink blush that greatly contrasts with the unhealthy looking pale skin of her face.

"Ash please give my feet the same wonderfully twisted passion that you gave my older sister."The nine-year-old emo softly proclaims in a monotone voice. She quietly sat down with no fanfare and removed her midnight black slippers. The Goth places near the spooked teenager and crosses her fat and plump soles.

Ash cautiously approach the home shoes, and once got close enough he was instantly greeted by Lucy's foot smell. While there that potent good old sour cheesiness normally associated with feet, the goth's foot odor was no way near as potent as the sporty tomboy's own clodhoppers. And plus there was certain...distinct earthiness to the smell and was further enhanced by fragrant aromas of blackberries and lilacs.

And finally, he saw the shoe size number was a "nine and a half", a really impressive thing for a young girl such as herself. Ash slowly turned around as saw the soft-spoken girl giving him another creepy smile. But his face reddened as the sight of her fatty mushy soles making numerous creases and wrinkles. Her plump toes were messily painted in a mishmash of white, black, and grey. Lucy's smile appears to widen considerably at his gawking.

Curiously, Lynn was giving the two the stink eye, and her lips were making a slight pout.

Despite her haunting appearance and demeanor, Lucy was actually...flustered, finding herself liking Ash...a lot. But unknown to her, Ash's own feelings weren't exactly mutual. In fact, he finds..her creepy as hell. He saw far too many cheesy horror movies, and Lucy is giving off a alot of those red flags.

But he also does find the girl adorable...in a morbid sort of way. And he afraid she and her hellions for sisters would do to him if he declines.

What happens next?
1343322222222222212221111132.title: Crawling in my skin...

choices: Lynn kicks it up a notch..
13433222222222222122211111322.content:
Ash is too far deep in the rabbit hole to quit now. So he glumly steps forward to the gothic soles. Her mild smell while much stronger up close and personal, it was still nowhere near as oppressive and smothering as the tomboy's own musk. In fact, it was almost..inviting. With his damned blush returning, he places his palm near her right heel.

'Holy crap...her feet are so soft and pudgy. I guess she doesn't walk much. Very much unlike Ms.Sporty.' Ash mused as he caresses her pale soles. Taking a small notice at the little twitches they make. Lucy, on the other hand, was beyond frazzled. Her hands were covering her beet red face and hiding a wobbly smile from her siblings.

As he continues his little massage, Lucy slowly lowers her feet. Gently mashing Ash's face and upper-body up against the flesh. Simply taking the action as a signal, the boy starts to give little smooches, causing the little emo to give off some adorable giggles and...sweetly caress the boy.

'Hey...maybe she isn't so bad.' Ash suddenly thought as he felt her giving him a weird massage. An odd but sweet gesture.

As Lucy continues her little affectionate game, Lynn couldn't help but feel...miffed. How can little miss hot topic make Ash...so eager? Did one of those stupid spells finally worked or something like. With an annoyed huff, the annoyed girl got up from the couch, and walk towards the pair. There she simply sat in front of the other girl and mashed her feet up against hers.

"Lynn! What the hell are you doing!" Lucy suddenly squeaks in surprise, a divergence from her usual monotone manner of speaking. The hardness of the older pair of feet was such a weird feeling.

"Tsk Tsk Lucy, what will Mom say and do if she heard you right now?" Lynn innocently fluttering her eyes at her, and her feet began to rub against the Goth's own at a strange pace."And to answer your question. My dogs are still barking, so I still need Ash's help."

"Can you wait, after I'm done? You could have hurt Ash." Lucy monotonously scolded her older sister. Her voice began to strain, as she instantly knew what mischevious girl is planning on doing. Meanwhile, Ash was in-between both sisters' soles. Luckily he was in was in an opening, so he wasn't completely sandwiched in. But the combined odors was making his head swim in laps, and he was getting pretty damn tired of the loud sisters'antics.

"I'm pretty sure he fine. And besides, we need to spend more time together.~" Lynn cooed as her toes gently scared against Lucy's misstep. Causing the little beatnik to form a wobbly half mile and uncharismatic giggling. The young girl managed to refrain herself from busting a gut...for now. But Lynn's toes was proving to be a tough opponent.

As all this happen, Ash grew more and more annoyed. It is about time for the boy to strike back! And there are two pairs of cute feet for him to rained his vengeance on.

What happens next?
13433222222222222122211111322.title: A sore as hell winner

choices: Lucy and Lynn kept you, for now...
Lola and Lana wanted their own turn, now!
Actually, Luan wanted a turn, too...
134332222222222221222111113222.content:
Lucy didn't know what to think right now; her mind was racing, her face burning with embarrassment.

What she had been doing with the tiny teen shortly ago was embarrassing already, but this? It was indescribable. If she had to write a poem about it, she'd say it felt like being watched while showering, albeit it'd be complicated to find a proper rhyme.

As for Lynn, she too was blushing but, unlike her younger sibling and roommate, she wore a very large grin upon her face.

She could feel the little guy squirming in between her and Lucy's feet. The sensation felt amazing, something she never felt before.

She could never imagine that, in all of this, your patience was quickly running out. You were feeling dizzy because of the mix of smells and your lungs were burning, your mouth and nose desperately tried to take in fresh air but couldn't find any.

If the two giant siblings kept this up for longer, you were sure you were gonna faint; not wanting to even imagine what these wild cats would do to an unconscious you, you set your mind and body on fighting back.

And one's greatest mistake is to underestimate a cornered rat...

"Say Luce, how does this feel?" Lynn teased her eight year old sibling, who furiously bit her lower lip.

"Lynn-" she began, but her sentence was interrupted as a strong, tickling sensation began spreading throughout her at light speed: something, or rather someone, just began squirming wildly against her foot, as well as Lynn's.

Almost immediately, the older sister bursted out laughing; disliking laughter, Lucy tried to contain herself by shutting her mouth.

But she found it rather hard to keep herself from laughing: her already red cheeks puffed out as she held herself back for about five seconds, before starting laughing uncontrollably herself.

The two laughing titanesses nearly dropped to the floor from the sensation you were giving them; too bad for them, they didn't notice that the two walls of flesh that surrounded you had loosened up in the meantime, giving you a chance to get free.

Hastily, you spread your limbs as wide as you could and began pushing back with all your might.

Incredibly, you actually managed to push back both feet keeping you trapped.

Lynn and Lucy seemed to notice, because they suddenly looked in your direction.

"W-Wha-" Lynn stuttered while still caught up in a fit of laughter; she wasn't quick enough to push her foot forward again and you made a leap, the feet you were trapped between earlier colliding behind you while you rolled down on the carpeted floor.

Lynn's eyes widened - that was really impressive of the 'shrimp'. Lucy's gaping jaw suggested that she was in the same line of thinking.

You shakily stood back up and brushed yourself off with your hands before turning around to send a glare to the two siblings.

"Will you please explain what the hell was that!?" you exclaimed,
"I was about to pass out back there!"

Lucy and Lynn seemed taken aback by the outburst. Majorly the second, she thought this little guy liked this kind of stuff... at least from what she had seen and experienced.

"Geez, calm down," she said with a shrug,
"Weren't you enjoying this?"

You flushed red, ashamed to have to admit to yourself that a small part of you DID enjoy it.

"Lo-Look," you stuttered, dropping your glare,
"... This is all going a bit too fast for me. I've just woken up here and you're all-" you trailed off, your blush deepening,
"... What I mean is, I don't know where I am, I don't know how I got here and I don't know why I'm this size. So... I need help,"

Lynn shot Lucy a brief glance, before looking down at you.

"Well, huh..." she began, bending over to pick you up with a hand,
"We don't quite know how you got here, either; Lana was the one finding you asleep and showed you to us. As for your size..."

Lynn offered another shrug at this point, and so did Lucy: they were just as clueless as you were about this.

"Allow me," a third voice lisped, causing you to turn around, only to see another giantess, way shorter than the other two but still huge to you; she wore a green sweater, pink pants and brown shoes, along with huge glasses on her face. She had brown, ruffled hair.

"Oh, hey Lis..." Lynn greeted the newcomer, having completely forgotten her younger siblings were all still there, with the exception of Lily. Not only her younger sisters though, Luan too was still there, sitting on the couch, her head sunken behind a book she was holding upside down in an attempt to hide the furious blush she wore on her face. Clearly, she had been staring at Lynn and Lucy's 'playtime'.

Lola and Lana too were staring at the two roommates with amused expressions on their faces and, every once in awhile, they shot you expectant smirks.

"Your size must have somehow altered, leading you to shrink to this small size. I have never heard of something like this though, but if I had to make a theory, I'd say your body was hit with some kind of shrinking energy that caused you this disgrace," Lisa continued while looking at you, who felt like an insect under a magnifying glass,
"As for your arrival here, I can't think of anything aside from a willing entrance in our household."

"Willing?" you parroted back,
"No no, you're getting it wrong! I was studying for an exam, but I think I sorta drifted off at some point... when I woke up, I was here, like this, with you guys..." you nervously explained.

"Tough situation, huh?" Lynn empathically chimed from behind you,
"You're a poor lost soul whose fate has shown to be incredibly cruel." Lucy added.

What a drama queen, you thought to yourself.

"Then this is an incredibly singular occurrence," Lisa continued, before looking at her older siblings, who were still sitting beside each other, barefoot,
"If you just hand him to me for a couple hours, I'll be studying hi-"

"Wait a sec, who said we're handing him?" Lynn interrupted, with a wide grin on her face,
"This little shrimp and us have still a lot of fun ahead of us,"

You looked back at the sporty brunette, blushing, but with a worried expression. Her idea of 'fun' was confirmed by now.

You gulped to yourself.

You told to yourself that, even though you didn't know how, you were here now, the size of a doll, and these giantesses weren't going to let you got so easily.
134332222222222221222111113222.title: Lisa's theory

choices: "... you're gonna be the perfect boyfriend!"
1343322222222222212221111132221.content:
At the mention of 'fun', all the siblings present in the room began eyeing you expectantly, almost in a hungry fashion. And the thought that you might be eaten alive for real certainly scared you...

Even Luan was taking discreet glances at you before looking away, blushing.

Luckily, you weren't going to be around her for much longer, because Lynn suddenly decided that it was time to bring this little guy somewhere private to enjoy 'quality time'.

"Me and Lucy get this lil' runt first," the sporty teen proclaimed.

You shivered, what other kinds of sick fun could Lynn harbor while you were with them?

Lisa simply shrugged, Luan said nothing and Lucy blushed even more. But Lola and Lana were two fighters,

"Hey! That's not fair!" they protested in unison, shooting their sporty sister two identical glares,
"You got him so far, it should be our turn now!" Lola continued.

"Nope, he's still all ours," Lynn simply responded while standing back up, holding you in a hand while the other went to take Lucy's arm as she began dragging her roommate across the house and towards the room they both shared.

Growls of annoyance accompanied the two sisters and you as they climbed upstairs.

Shortly after, the sound of a door shutting could be heard downstairs.

--

"Hey, Lucy," Lynn began once the two giantesses you were apparently stuck with right now closed the door; Lynn, much like before, appeared somewhat flustered and embarrassed, a blush adorned her face.

"... Yeah?" Lucy asked, taken aback by her sister's unusual behavior. Usually, Lynn was though, and aggressive, and noisy; this Lynn didn't seem herself at all.

"I-I know what I said, but d'ya think you could leave me and this runt alone for a moment?" Lynn stuttered, before she regained a confident smirk, which she shot you,
"I wanna have some more fun with ya, shrimp,"

Okay, you weren't sure if you liked that.

"Actually-" you tried to oppose, but were interrupted by Lucy, who spoke as if you weren't even there,
"But Lynn," she said,
"It was my turn still..."

"Yeah, but... I'll give him to ya later, okay?" the older sister insisted. Lucy saw no point in arguing any further: if her sister decided she wanted some time with the tiny helper first, she was going to get it no matter what she said or did.

"Sigh." the goth told gloomily as she headed to... a coffin.

Your eyes shot open, there was a coffin on top of an actual bed.

Lucy opened the lid and slid inside, before letting the lid fall back in place, shutting the coffin like it was no big deal.

Was every member of this family so... particular, you asked yourself. You had no time to find answers.

"Ahem," Lynn cleared her throat, drawing your attention towards her. You also had a chance to take a look at her side of the room, and judged that it looked like a hurricane had passed there: shirts stained with what appeared to be mud were scattered around on the floor along with several different balls of all sizes and shapes, a baseball bat and a hockey stick.

Your gaze ultimately went back to the brunette giantess, who was staring down at you with a smirk, as well as a blush.

"So, ready for some more fun?" she asked in an eager voice as she turned around and climbed on her bed with you still in her hand.

She sat on her pillow, her slender legs stretching to the farthest point they could reach.

And then, Lynn leaned forward, extending her arm and placing you right back at her feet, their smell almost immediately launching an assault on your senses. And now that you were this close, it was quadrupled from the last time you smelt it.

The temptation to cover your nose grew stronger and stronger each second you spent next to this titaness' feet, but you fought the urge to shoot a glance past them. Something that didn't result too easy, given how high they were compared to you, but you regardless managed to catch a glimpse of Lynn's smirking but blushing visage.

"Ya do a good job down there, bud," she said with unwell hidden excitement, the kind of excitement you'd hear in a younger child about to receive candy from their mother.

You remained silent and hesitated in front of the impressively big soles of the brunette.

Should you...?

What the heck, you decided, you've already given yourself to these giantesses' whims, what was the point in stopping now? That'd only make Lynn upset, and you definitely didn't want to be around in such occurrence.

So, after a few more moments of hesitation, you began gingerly extending your hands and slid them along Lynn's left foot, deciding to start off with a foot rub. Maybe not what she was expecting, but still a good way to please her.

As a matter of fact, shortly after you started, Lynn began moaning softly and put a hand to her mouth in an attempt to choke back her murrs of pleasure.

This little guy was good at this, she thought; again, that feeling she felt before showed up again. She felt embarrassed, unsure and fragile as an egg shell.

The guy at her feet was doing a pretty good job and she felt so good, but so awkward...

Just what was happening to her?

This was the first time she felt this kind of sensation; she had felt something similar only whenever she and her siblings had nice moments together, but this feeling was much stronger.

...

Was she perhaps growing attached to the little guy? A perfect stranger, an abnormality... but also a willing playmate that didn't judge her for her... 'particular interests'...

While thinking about such things, Lynn discovered she was blushing madly while you had changed foot in the meantime, massaging it the best you could while also doing your best not to inhale the smell too much. It burned your nostrils and slowly worked it's way into your system, who knew for how long you were going to to he smelling it before fresh air replaced it.

Seeing you work with such devotion made Lynn smile, before another moan escaped her mouth.

Then, all of a sudden, a crazy idea came to her; at first, she laughed at it and tried to shake it off.

But then, she actually started liking the thought quite a bit.

"Hey shorty," she addressed you, wiggling her toes above your head,
"Listen, I was thinkin' about something..."

Lynn blushed furiously and trailed off.

You didn't know how to take her reaction at her own words, but nonetheless found enough courage to ask,

"... And?"

Lynn laughed awkwardly.

"I was thinking..."
1343322222222222212221111132221.title: Lynn's lusted leisure

choices: The scheming twins brought their poor father as payback?! And they heard it all.
It was Lucy? She wants to try again with Ash, only this time she goes all in.
A white-haired boy...and he was just shocked at what he just saw.
13433222222222222122211111322211.content:
"... you're gonna be the perfect boyfriend!" Lynn squeaked out. Her blush reaching a new shade of crimson. Despite having just met the shrunken boy, ...she really..likes the boy. Maybe because of the dorky way his black hair is cut or the way he squeals in fright. All the girl knows that she just like him...okay!

And the fact he likes her feet, one of the things about her loving siblings downright fears.Except for Lana...because, her feet can rival her own and the little loves all things gross and "gnarly". But with Ash..it's completely different, the foot rub he gives earlier was simply a deal breaker.

Meanwhile, the coffin's door was slightly cracked open. Emerald eyes faintly could be seen watching the two. Despite being seemingly apathetic, there was a strange spark in them. was it jealousy or just mere curiosity? Tims will tell.

"....Excuse...but what you just said?" Ash smartly said as his rub comes to a halt. The smell must have started to mess with your eardrums. Suddenly you found your body being wrapped by the first two toes of her right foot. Making torso very wet in the process. You found yourself staring at the face of a pissed off Lynn loud.

"I. said. you. are. gonna. be. my. boyfriend. you. cute. little. bastard!" The frustrated girl forced out every single syllable with clenched teeth. Anger was presented in her voice, and the blush red reached a new shade of red.

"Oh okay..." Ash was simply shocked by these turn of events but didn't resist. Knowing full well she can do anything she wants with him. That, and he finds her adorable...maybe "sexy". But it, not just her big old feet he likes about. It was how spunky she acts and the way she giggled.

And the way her body is shaped and growing into....he's a growing boy after all. And growing boys tend to noticed certain things about girls...and themselves.

"And now for making your awesome girlfriend pissed off. You going have to be given a lot of extra speical kisses to her dainty little feet." The girl made an angry giggle as she releases the boy. Her feet began to rub against each other. The grinding sounds that made him all sweaty."Do a good job, and I...give you a lot of kisses little guy!~"

With the cheeky little wink, the boy walks towards the feet. Admiring the sun-kissed skin and lighter shade they possessed. But as he reached midway, someone decided to interrupt their little date, catching the two kids right in the act.

Who was it?
13433222222222222122211111322211.title: Congratulations! You caught a wild TOMBOY!

choices: Lincoln was still incredulous and wanted a better look at you
134332222222222221222111113222113.content:
Before you could approach your new, self-proclaimed girlfriend's feet again, you were stopped; at the same time, her grin died down on her face as she adopted a startled expression when someone cried,

"Lynn!?"

Hearing her name being called, or rather shouted, Lynn rose her head. You turned around, leaving the smell of the giantess' feet behind for a moment.

That's when you noted who called Lynn's name.

Standing by the doorway was a white haired boy wearing an orange polo, blue jeans and white sneaker; he was younger than you, and yet he had white hair. You wondered how that could be possible, but your attention was quickly drawn by the expression he carried on his face: shock.

Timidly, wondering if he saw you, you looked back, wondering how fast you could hide in between Lynn's feet before he noted you.

Alas, as it soon became clear, the boy noticed you already, when an irritated Lynn commanded,

"Get out of here, stinkin'!" she exclaimed, blushing red once more,
"Can't you see I'm busy?"

"Who is he?" Lincoln replied, pointing to your small body.

"Uh... he's... um..." Lynn tried to come up with something she could tell her brother so that she could quickly dismiss him and return to her fun.

However, before she could reply, a muffled voice spoke from the coffin,

"He is Lynn's new boyfriend."

You instinctively looked at the coffin: it didn't take a genius to figure out that Lucy was the one speaking, though you could feel something in her voice, an indecipherable emotion between annoyance and jealousy. Perhaps, you mused, she was just angry Lynn snatched you during her turn.

Such line of thinking made you feel like you were a pet.

However, your attention went back to Lincoln the moment he stuttered,

"B-Boyfriend?" he asked, looking in direction of Lucy's coffin before he slowly turned back to Lynn and you,
"Why is he... small? Where did you even find someone like him?" he asked.

Seriously, he was just passing when he saw his sister with a little guy; at first he thought the little fella was nothing more than a doll, albeit he had wondered what was Lynn doing with such thing; however, when he saw Lynn talking to 'it' and it began moving, the boy had no more doubts.

He even thought he was simply hallucinating when he heard Lynn saying he was her boyfriend, but now Lucy gave a confirm.

You felt uneasy under the boy's bewildered gaze and looked back at the giantess whose bed you were on; however, your thoughts were interrupted when you were picked up by your new girlfriend.

"Who is this guy?" you whispered, staring at Lynn in the eye,
"My brother, Lincoln," she replied, whispering as well, before shooting her brother another look.

"... Look stinkin', he's just a lil' fella we found. He's tiny because... why are you tiny again?" Lynn asked, having focused on her fun and her feelings so much that she had forgotten Lisa's words already.

"Um... shrinking energy or somethin'..." you timidly responded, still nervous about this whole thing; you turned around on the brunette's palms to shoot her younger brother a flustered state, deciding to break the ice before this got any weirder,
"Hi?" you awkwardly tried, mentally cursing yourself for sounding so meek, like a cornered mouse. Not that you could help it, this situation was so awkward you really didn't know what to do.

You just hoped Lynn, Lucy, Lincoln and the other siblings in the other room didn't have any more siblings you had to be introduced to, because you weren't sure you couldn't handle this level of stress again. In comparison, your studying for your exam last night sounded like the easiest thing ever.

You had no idea what awaited you just out of this room...

"Who are you?" Lincoln asked once he noted you were able to talk.

"My name is Ash. Um, nice to meet you." you hastily added, introducing yourself.

Lincoln was still shocked but, offered an explanation, he calmed down a bit.

"... Nice to meet you too." he awkwardly replied,
"So..."

"Will you leave already!?" Lynn yelled before her brother could say what he had to.

You saw Lincoln hesitating.
134332222222222221222111113222113.title: Awkward encounter

choices: She removes her slippers,and presents her feet to Ash.
She chickens out,and tells him jokes instead!
1343322222222222212221112.content:
Luan beaten Lynn by a hair. Luan look totally surprised by this outcome,and while Lynn looks disappointed and salty.

"Later Ashy.." The sporty girl giggled at your blushing face.While Luan looks at you with great confusion.

"Hurry up Luan!" The pretty pink princess yelled at her."We don't have all day!!"

"Yeah luan..." The sporty girl added with a big shit-eating grin that reeks of teasing."Don't'cha want..."

Lynn then whisper something in Luan's right ear. The jokester's face became red as a sunset,and lip became quiverily like a earthquake.

She quickly shove the sniggling sister away from her. She then look at you.

What does she do?
1343322222222222212221112.title: The jokester's dilemma

choices: Ash plays with the poor girl's feet.
Lynn "helps" Luan,by making her tease him.
13433222222222222122211121.content:
"Okay..fine, I'll do..it" Luan said with a big blush,as she crosses her pink slippers. She shakily took them off.And reveal her shapely and wide feet.

'I guess the remark about them having big feet has some truth..' Ash thought as he simply stare at Luan's monolithic soles with.They got to be a size ten and half.

Lynn deviously snickered as she suddenly grabbed one of the discarded slippers.Where she took a big sniff at it.

"Phew...Luan!" Lynn playfully gagged and cough, much to Luan's suffering and embrassment."Your feet are awfully ripe today. Maybe even as much mine!"

"Well I had a very busy day today thank you very much!" Luan annoyingly shouted at her.She loves her siblings to death,but she wasn't in the mood for their usual bullshit.

"Let's just get this over Ash...alright?" Luan loudly said to the tiny teenager.He could tell she really enjoying this in a kinda subtle way.But she clearly wasn't comfortable,and being pressured by the aggressively playful Lynn.

But still.. Ash would kinda enjoy this experience.And with that,he begins to walks towards her
13433222222222222122211121.title: The cute comedian.

choices: Luna or Lincoln got you first
13433222222222222122212.content:
Your jaw hung open and your eyelids forcefully parted ways at the sight before your eyes.

In front of you, three unknown girls, teens you'd say, who were shooting you wide grins, and a definitely younger boy who was staring straight at you with what appeared to be a concerned expression, though curiosity and amusement didn't lack in the look her was giving you.

Now, this would appear somewhat normal and would be defined kidnapping, but you could tell that something was off by just glancing around: these guys, and everything around them, they were absolutely gigantic! They were at least thirty times your size!

A million questions began forming in your racing mind while your heart began beating faster.

But your questions came to an end when you heard a noise slowly bringing you back to reality: one of the three giantesses, with blonde hair and wearing a light blue top and brown shorts along with azure shoes, was snapping her fingers.

"Are you even there, shrimp?" she questioned.

"Of course he's there!" the second blonde titaness, who was wearing a light green dress and stylish sandals, chimed,
"He's right in front of us!"

"No, Leni, that's not what I meant..." the first giantess chimed with a hint of exasperation.

"Dudes, maybe he can't remember?" the giantess with dark brown hair said; you noted she was wearing a purple shirt as well as a purple skirt and boots.

"I think there's one way to find out..." the boy muttered; he inexplicably had white hair and wore an orange polo and jeans with white sneakers.

The titan turned his gaze towards you, who remained in silence the whole time these giants debated, still trying to process what was going on.

Then, before your eyes, the giant began kneeling down, his hands touching the carpeted floor and his face stopping at inches before you, causing you to shiver.

"Hey little guy," he spoke, his voice ringing in your ears,
"Can you talk? Do you remember who you are?"

Your first instinct was to scream at top of your lungs, but you forcefully suppressed it lest that wouldn't make a good first impression.

So, telling yourself that your actions might change your near future drastically, you began searching for a proper choice of words.

"Y... Yes." you stuttered,
"... And yes. My name's Ash."

"Alright, great," the tallest of the three girls behind the boy chimed as she too leaned closer,
"Then you can start explaining what are you doing in this house shrimp."

Her tone wasn't too hostile, but it wasn't one you'd call friendly either.

"I-I... don't know!" you exclaimed,
"I just woke up here! I was kinda studying for an exam back home when I drifted off... next thing I know is that I'm here somehow, with you guys. I don't how."

"D'aww, you poor thing..." the giantess with the green dress, Leni you heard the other giantess call her, chimed.

"That is sad, dude." the third giantess agreed.

"Perhaps we should introduce ourselves before getting to the wrong idea, Lori..." the boy spoke again, before once more turning back to you with a smile,
"Mind if I pick you up?"

He didn't wait for an answer and reached forward. However, his attempt to pick you up was foiled by the tallest titaness, 'Lori'.

"Lincoln, he's probably literally really fragile." she scolded while pulling back the boy named Lincoln.

"Yeah Lincoln, he's, like, super small!" Leni agreed, before looking down at you with a smile,
"I'll help you up."

"No!" the three other giants said at the same time, nearly deafening you.

Geez, these kids sure were noisy...

Hastily, Lori bent down and scooped you up in both hands while Lincoln stood back up as well.

"So, we are the Louds." she began while looking at you,
"I'm Lori Loud."

"My name is Leni Loud!" the second chimed cheerfully.

"Mine's Luna Loud!" the third exclaimed quite loudly. Wow, in name and in essence, you mused.

"And I'm Lincoln Loud." the boy properly introduced himself, before continuing,
"Do you have any idea how you shrunk down to that size?"

"Wait, shrunk?" Leni interrupted,
"You mean... he's not normally that tiny and cute?"

You felt vaguely embarrassed at being called 'cute'.

"Um... definitely not," you answered, before turning back to Lincoln,
"And I don't... I have no idea why I'm like this or why I'm here right now, really."

"Hey, perhaps..." Luna wondered, moving a hand to her chin,
"... Maybe Lisa could help you, with your size at least. She's a real brain-box..."

At this point, Lori grinned sinisterly.

"Are you kidding right now?" she asked,
"This shrimp's gonna help us around from now on!"

You froze up at the statement.

What did that mean...?

"But, Lori-" Lincoln tried to argue, but was interrupted by his sister.

"Don't you need some help with your... thing, too?" she asked, silencing her brother, who adopted a pensive expression.

As a matter of fact, he could use someone to help with homework and stuff...

"Not to mention the... 'special stuff' he could do for us..." Lori continued, her grin growing immense, just like the fear she was striking into you.

Just what hell have you ended up in?

"It'd be amazing to have a rock buddy..." Luna murmured, smiling from ear to ear. Leni too had her own smile, and you became aware that, at least for now, you weren't getting any help.

You gulped.

"Now, as the eldest, I get him first." Lori proclaimed with authority, beginning to walk with you still in her hands.

However...

"Don't think so, dude!" Luna chimed, grabbing Lori by her arm,
"I want him first!"

"Hey, let go!"

Instead of letting go, Luna hardened her grip, but it didn't help her to get you; taking the opportunity, Leni reached forward and snatched you in her own hands.

"He's coming with me first." she said, eyeing you with a gentle smile.

Sadly, she was pulled back by both her sisters as they started fighting.

"Whoa!" you exclaimed in between three behemoths that tried to pull you towards themselves.

At some point, while you were caught in Luna's palm, a slap made you soar high in the sky and fall back down from a lethal height.

Luckily, Lincoln was still there and managed to catch you, breaking your fall; he couldn't believe it, he was usually terrible at catching.

"GIRLS!" he cried, and immediately the fight ceased,
"Can't we just decide who gets him first?"

His sisters agreed with him and, as the four siblings began debating, you sighed to yourself, still startled by the chain of events that led you to this point.

Your thoughts were however interrupted shortly after they began: it appeared that the siblings reached an agreement.
13433222222222222122212.title: A new perspective

choices: You chose Luna. She'll be more mature than her brother, right...?
You chose Lincoln. He seemed way quieter than Luna
134332222222222221222123.content:
"Okay then," Lori spoke in an annoyed tone, hands on her hips and a frown on her face,
"Leni and I will wait our turn to have the shrimp, but you two better hurry up!" she exclaimed, referring to Luna and Lincoln, who apparently got to have you first.

Both donned big smiles while Lori looked upset and Leni disappointed.

"Dang it..." the latter muttered, before shooting her siblings a stare,
"Which one of you gets him first?"

Luna and Lincoln replied at once,

"Me, of course!" they exclaimed, only to then look at each other in disbelief.

In all of this, you were left sitting on the boy's hand, feeling bitter.

You were sick already of being talked about as if you weren't there, or as if you were nothing more than a pet to these giants.

It was so frustrating, but you couldn't do anything about it, which only resulted in this being even more frustrating for you.

It was hopeless.

These titans were bigger, more than you and two of them were definitely older than you, not to mention three of them were girls: even if you were normal-sized, you could have done nothing against them.

Your sour thoughts were interrupted by the voices of the two titans who apparently got you first,

"No way, bro! The lil' dude's mine for now! You can have him later." Luna argued, but Lincoln stood his ground,
"No Luna, I get him first! He's fragile, he needs to be handled with care!"

You sighed, right before the air was forced out of your lungs as a pair of large hands wrapped around your body. Those hands were Luna's.

The brunette began pulling you towards her, but her brother gripped the lower half of your body and pulled you back.

You felt pain. A lot.

You felt like you were going to snap in two when help finally came.

"You guys! No one's gonna get him if you kill him first!" Lori, who was still there, exclaimed while separating her two siblings by stepping in between them.

Your body was let go of and was left into Lincoln's hands, though not for long. In fact, Lori hastily grabbed a hold of you and scooped you up.

She was about to proclaim her intention to get you first, but she noticed you were in pain... and something in her changed.

She felt pitiful.

"Oh my gosh, are you alright little fella?" a caring voice you recognized as Leni's chimed in as she leaned over to see you better.

"Y-Yeah..." you stuttered,
"I think..."

Lori sighed, then turned to Luna and Lincoln.

"Guys... why don't you let the shrimp decide who he wants to be with first?" she suggested.

The statement hit you, just like it hit the giantess' siblings.

Did she actually say those words? Huh, maybe she wasn't so bad.

"Sounds fair." Lincoln admitted, scratching the back of his head while shooting you a sorrowful stare,
"Sorry little guy, we got carried away."

"Yeah, didn't mean to hurt you dude." Luna apologized as well.

'They're caring in their own way...' you mused.

"So, you choose. Which one of us do you want to stay with, for now?" the white haired boy asked you more gently.

You internally groaned.

They still wanted to do this.

"Well..." you hesitated, wondering who was your safest choice between Luna and Lincoln since you didn't get to turn them down for obvious reasons.

Your hesitation soon caused Lori to sigh.

"Hurry up shrimp. I literally don't have all day for this." she said.

You sighed, and considered your options.

Luna seemed older than her brother and that meant she was also more mature, but ever since she introduced herself, she's made clear she wasn't the quietest person in this house.

If she got too excited about the whole 'lil' dude' thing, you feared you were gonna be killed by accident.

Then, there was Lincoln, who seemed the quietest among this group but also the youngest, though he seemed to have enough common sense to say you needed to be handled with care.

"C'mon dude, you're taking too much time!" Luna scolded impatiently as she crossed her arms; he hid it very well, but Lincoln was impatient to hear your choice as well.

Again, you sighed.

And finally, you made a choice.

Standing at the door were two figures, the first looked like a smaller version of Kuki dressed in purple with a rather sinister looking smirk on her face that seemed to be locked right onto your location. To her left was an absolutely towering goddess of a woman who you could only assume was the girls' mother.
"Kuki who were you talking to earlier?" the older woman asks, not noticing you yet. Before she could answer, the younger one was standing right over you reaching down. "Hey what's this?" you tried to get away from her only to run into Kuki's bare foot. Both girls laughed before Kuki picked you up and showed you to both of the new faces. "This is my new friend. He's really tiny. We were just playing. He likes when I smoosh him between my feet!" She says cheerfully. Of course this was NOT true, nor was it something you wanted her telling others, ESPECIALLY her own mother. "I- THat's not true. I was ju-" You stopped as Kuki pulled you into a tight hug forcing the air out of you. Peeking back at their mother, you expected to see anger or rage. But instead what you saw was a grin. You weren't sure if that was worse or not.

Suddenly the younger sisters face appeared and covered your entire field of vision. "COOOOOOOOOL!" can I see him?" you kept repeating no, but Kuki gave a cheerful "Okay!" The smaller hands grabbed you tightly as she inspected you struggling in her iron grip. She poked you in a few places before shouting. "Let's play a game with him!" Both girls seemed very excited by the idea while their mother simply grinned and watched. "Oh lets keep teasing him like this!" Kuki said as she gently pinned you under her foot. "Nah Lets STOMP around and see how long he can keep away!" Her sister said stomping her foot on the floor inches away from you with a deafening thud. "Mushi, I don't think he'll like that game." Kuki said, revealing the little hellion's name. Mushi pouted and you let out a sigh of relief that your energetic caretaker seemed to be watching your back... that is, before Kuki added, "You need to take your shoes off so you don't hurt him. Duh!" You turned pale at this suggestion. "W-what!" you looked to the mother for help, but she seemed amused by her daughters having fun together. "Now girls. maybe you should only play with him one at a time for now. Im sure playing with two giants will be a lot for him right now." Both girls looked back to their mother. "But you could play with us too mom. Why don't we all play whatever we decide!" You tried to protest, but Mushi' grabbed hold of you again, pressing you tightly against her as the three debated what they should do with you.

1343322222222222221.content:
Of all of the places you could've woken up, it just had to be a cold metallic surface. Somehow you had ended up on a steel table holding a lot of different scientific vials and tools. Not wanting to end up in an even worse predicament, you were careful to steer clear of them as you navigated around the table. Looking at your surroundings, it was easy to tell that you were in a laboratory of some sort. But whose?

Just as that thought passed through your mind, the laboratory's door flew open at such an extreme speed that the glass attached to it shattered in a instant. Frightened by the sudden motion, you covered your head in your hands, looking away as someone stomped their way into the laboratory. The footsteps sounded heavy, too heavy to be a normal person, but you were too afraid to look. The footsteps came closer and closer to the table you were on and stopped as soon as the person reached the table.

After a few moments of silence, you decide to finally look up at whoever had barged into the lab. Tilted your head upwards, you see none other than the Incredible Hulk! And he was staring down on you! Scared out your mind by the green giant, you instantly run to the edge of the table to make your escape. But as you got there, you notice that the Giant Hulk isn't making a move to grab you. You stop and look up again. Hulk wasn't looking down you. He was looking down on his many vials, seemingly trying to find one in particular. You breathe a sigh of relief.

It was at this time that you noticed how close to the Hulk's waist you are. You could see the top of his tattered pink shorts. The button was undone, the fly was mostly down, and the Incredible Hulk has no need for underwear so it didn't leave much to the imagination. You could practically see part of the Hulk's penis bursting through the denim and you could definitely see the large tuft of pubic hair at the top.

The Hulk leans forward to reach a vial and slams into the table in the process, breaking you out of your trance in the worst way possible. Being so close to the edge of the table when Hulk reached for the vial has caused to teeter over the precipice. Instinctually, you grab on to whatever may be near by which is, of course, the jeans of the Incredible Hulk.

So here you are hanging from the pants of a gigantic green well-endowed humanoid. You are too scared to climb or do anything other than hold on.
But the Hulk has different plans.

1412.content:
Ash's head was pounding. What the hell happened? He turned over in his stomach, how did he get on the ground? The last thing he recalled was a blue flash and--

Wait. This wasn't ground.

He looked up, blinked a few times, and then around him. He'd been to enough car shows know what the inside of a 1959 Cadillac when he saw one. And the way this one was decorated on the inside, he knew who lived in it. He knew it was impossible, but that didn't change what his senses were telling him. This was the home of Fifi La Fume. He was sure of it, well as sure as he could be with the scale of everything.

Everything looked hundreds of feet tall, another impossibility. Nevertheless he had to accept what he was seeing and feeling was real. The occupant of this dwelling was nowhere to be seen, he wondered where was she, how would he react when he saw her? He stood up, his headache was going away. Ash decided since he was alone, he saw no reason not to look around a bit. So long as he respected Fifi's privacy he saw no harm in it. So where to first? Maybe the slippers under the dresser? The Box of Chocolates perhaps? He could use a bit of chocolate right about now. Or maybe--

FOOM

What was that? did he feel the floor shake?

FOOM

Someone was coming. Someone Big!

FOOM FOOM FOOM FOOM

Looks like his places he was going to explore was now his potential Hiding places. But he had to act quickly, where to hide?
1412.title: Fifi La Fume
