Father Bear feels something in his shoe
The Picnic is Over. Father Bear Stands up
1453111.content:
Ash landed abruptly on the back of Father Bear's foot/paw and tumbled down the slope into the leather shoe the Bear wore. Trying to slow himself down, he grasped at the thick coarse hair that grew all around him but it wasn't until he'd was hanging off the tip of a claw that he finally stopped. But just as he was about to breath a sigh of relief the clawed toe twitched causing him to lose his grip and he landed on the leather insole of the shoe.

Father Bear looked about for the "Bug" a few moments after he'd lost sight of it, then shrugged and looked at Mother Bear.

"I guessed I must've got it." he said and began to sit down.

This had an effect on Ash. For as Father Bear sat down, his foot/paw went from horizontal to vertical. Ash slid down under the claw and landed on the very tip of the toe pad. The pad felt wet at the touch and it was than that Ash became aware of the smell. How to describe it? It wasn't like the smell of a human foot. He could've guessed that it was the smell of a bear's foot mixed with leather if he knew what a bear's foot smelt like.

It was really dark in the shoe so he couldn't see much in the way of detail, but he did have a good idea how big this foot/paw was. He remembered reading that a Grizzly Bear, on average, was seven feet tall on it's back legs and had hind paws that were fifteen inches long. In the cartoon Father Bear was not nearly that tall. Maybe six foot five. Sill, if his Foot/Paw at Ash's scale was 12 inches it would still make it almost a hundred feet long.

Ash tried to climb further up onto the toe pad, this turned out to be a mistake. Whether it was a muscle twitch, or Father Bear felt something Ash really didn't know but the results were the same. The toe twitched and moved away from the insole. Because everything was so damp, the tiny human had nothing to hold onto and slipped downward only to be pinned between the toe pad and the insole of the shoe when the toe relaxed.

Pinned against the Leather and flesh, and finding it hard to breath, Ash wondered what he could do. He couldn't move without giving himself away, and that would only lead to his immediate death. If he didn't move, he most certainly be dead the Moment Father Bear stood up. His only chance was to slid further down and hope to get to the space under the toes. In theory, he could hold on to the fur growing there until Father Bear eventually took his shoe off.
1453111.title: Inside Father Bear's shoe

1453112.content:
After being sent tumbling through the air for what felt like forever, he finally made impact on a somewhat familiar surface. Ash was able to recognize that it was the waist of Father Bear's gray dress pants before the man himself had started moving again. As hard as he tried, Ash couldn't keep his grip on the gray fabric and was sent rolling down Father Bear's backside. Eventually, Ash found himself falling a great height from Father Bear's waist to the ground below. So great, that as soon as Ash had made contact with the dirt floor he fell into unconsciousness.

Ash was startled into awakening by an awful and incomprehensible stench. He slowly lifted his face off of the dirt to search for the source. Though, it didn't end up taking up much time, as the source was practically surrounding him. Ash looked up to find that Father Bear, who decided to take his shoes off, had kneeled to the ground, most of his body being supported by his knees.
For Ash, this meant that, because of his condition behind Father Bear, the two paws of the giant bear were at his sides and Father Bear's massive behind was looming over him, his cheeks bulging through the thin material of the dress pants.

Father Bear's rear end, combined with his dirty and sweaty paws, created a stench that made Ash anything but comfortable. Though, he was grateful that Father Bear's rump was hanging over him rather than crushing him, though Father Bear's terrible hygiene would most likely do Ash in before anything else.

Still, Ash had to get Father Bear's attention if he wanted help. But, he didn't know how comfortable he was with trying to get the attention of someone who had just tried to kill him. Maybe he should find someone else?
1453112.title: Overwhelmed

1453113.content: So, who's food does Ash land into? (More will be added to this chapter later).
1453113.title: That extra ingredent

145312.content:
Had Ash had started running sooner instead of standing in amazement as Father Bear began to rise there was a good chance he might've made it to safety. But his tiny legs were no match for the Giant Grizzly's stride. Everything grew dark around him, through the ground he felt the impact of the heel of the shoe as it touched down. Something hard knocked him forward and for a nanosecond he felt the soil on the side of his face before---

Father Bear heard and felt the satisfying crunch of the bug under his shoe. Twisting his foot back and forth he grounded the bug's remains into the dirt before sitting back under the tree.

'There' He thought 'One less bug at this Picnic.'
145312.title: Too Late.

choices: Make his way to her paws
Start the long climb to her ear
14532.content:
Ash stood there, his jaw hanging open , staring at the living mountain that was sitting before him.

It was her, no mistaking it. It was Mother Bear and despite her height of hundreds of feet tall she looked just as she did in the cartoon, right down to the clothes she wore. He watched her smiling at her family removing various foods and drink from the picnic basket beside her. She was totally oblivious to the literal ant man at her knee, and completely oblivious of the fact that a simple movement on her part would result in his death.

Ash closed his mouth and wondered just what the hell was he going to do next? From what he remembered she was a gentle and kind character, but this wasn't a character he was looking up at. Even if she was gentle, how gentle could she be to someone his size? That's even if he could get her attention, which was easier said that done. He remembered it been said that bears have a great hearing but he didn't want to start yelling. If he did that, she might not hear and if she did hear there was a chance she could inadvertently kill him before he got the chance to let her know where he was. He could think of two options, one he could start a long and dangerous climb up to Mother Bear's Ear. She sat sideways, so the other option was to make his way around to soles of her paws and tickle her to get her to investigate and then yell for her attention.

Both were equally dangerous.
14532.title: Mother Bear

choices: She stood up and he fell into her ear?
She stayed still and he was able to yell into it
145322.content:
Ash sat there for nearly a whole hour thinking hard to how to get this titanic bear in human's clothing attention when he realized "I have no other choice if I simply try and climb her paws she'll knock me off or squash me on the spot and I certainly can't yell up to her there's no way she'll be able to hear me.... Gulp I'll just have to climb to her ear...." As keeping a close eye on the monstrous brown mountain he began the long and tiring ascend towards Mother Bear's ear.

Mother Bear was enjoying herself while she watched her bear cub frolic and play and her husband fishing at the pond nearby "Ahhh it feels so nice to have a day without me having to clean and fix dinner for once,we should do this more often Little Bear,Father Bear the food will get cold if you two don't get over here in time." She called over her shoulder
"Don't worry Mother Bear we will!" Said her bear cub as he was busy chasing a floating butterfly in the air so engrossed in watching her family the gigantic she bear didn't notice the tiny human crawling on her dress.

Ash was slowly making his way inch by inch in order to prevent detection fear was edging more through his body than tiredness if and when the bear looked down and spotted him but fortunately she was far too engrossed looking at nature and her family to even feel him and he quickly picked up the pace as it looked like she was about to get up from her spot if she did he would no doubt fall to the ground and injure himself badly
"Just a bit further Ash buddy!" He told himself as he was nearing Mother Bear's neckline he prayed he didn't fall into the insides of her dress heaven only knew what was waiting for him at the bottom "Almost there...." He whimpered as his legs and arms were aching worse than ever just as he reached the lobes of Mother Bear's inner ear a bit later....
145322.title: Start the long climb to her ear

choices: Ash Land's in Mother Bear's cup
Ash Lands in Mother Bear's Salad
1453222.content:
Mother Bear sighed and watched her Husband and cub play. It was good to see them bond considering how often Father Bear was away fishing. She worried about that too, fishing was a dangerous job at times and it worried her that he would go out alone. He was an experienced sailor, but she knew things could go wrong.

But now was not the time to think of such things. Now was the time to relax and enjoy the quality time.

As she began to lean over her meal, she though she heard a voice. Very faint, but desperate. At first she wasn't sure, but then she heard it again, a bit louder but still faint. She quickly looked about but saw nothing.

'Strange', she thought 'I could've sworn I heard something.'

It had not gone as Ash had hoped. Far from it. The twitch of the ear, and the turn of one great brown eye in his direction the first time he cried out made him hopeful. But what happened the second time he cried out had caught him off guard. His tired Limbs were unprepared for the unexpected and violent turn of Mother Bear's head .So much so that he'd lost his already loosing grip on her fur and found himself Tumbling and falling head over heels. It wasn't like he had the power to stop himself, Where he was going to end up he had no idea.
1453222.title: Getting her attention. Sort of

choices: Ash begins to climb Little Bear
Ash crawls up Among Little Bear's paw pads
Ash makes his way to the front of Little Bear
Ash decides it's not worth it and makes his way away from the Bear Family
Little Bear sets his sandwich on the ground and Ash climbs up onto it.
14533.content:
Little Bear sat with his legs crossed, so the first thing Ash saw when he came out from under picnic blanket was a foot. But not quite a foot, it was more paw than foot and yet had elements of Both. It was cute, but at the same time was capable of leveling a house with a single step.

He should've been getting away from the giant cub and his family, but instead Ash found himself approaching the foot/paw. With great caution he reached out and touched the leathery sole. It felt hot, like blankets fresh out of the dryer. There was no reaction from Little Bear. That should've been the end of it, but Ash decided to be a bit more bold and ran his hand over the bumpy brown surface of a toe pad.

The toe twitched. The Cub had felt that. Upon compulsion Ash stretched out and pressed himself against the toe. The heat penetrated into his bones and felt good. Relaxing. This time the toe didn't move.

The whole foot shifted, knocking him backward. Looking skyward he gazed up at Little Bear expecting a retaliation, but there was no indication that the cub had felt him. Instead it seemed he had simply shifted position as he'd been handed a sandwich. That was a reality for the micro human. To Ash, Little Bear was a young god, and to Little Bear Ash was an insect. One that could be killed without effort. So why was it that after brushing off the dirt, Ash once again approached the Bear Cub? A part of him was telling him to get as far away as he could, but there was another part of him. One that knew that no matter how dangerous a giant of this size was, it was safer to stay closer to him than to go out on his own.

Something white and slightly damp landed not far from where Ash stood. Upon picking it up he realized it was a crumb that had fallen from Little Bear's sandwich. To survive he must live and to live he must eat. He took a bite. It was a strange tasting the saliva of another species but once he got past that he actually enjoyed the meal. More crumbs rained down around him. If he had a backpack he would've collected some for later. Instead he decided to do something that would probably turn out to be a big mistake.
14533.title: Little Bear

choices: There's a Flash Ash has entered another Cartoon
Chamametchi notices Something in her cereal
Ash tries to escape the Bowl before he's eaten
15.content:
Chamametchi, a really young rabbit like tamagotchi came running into the kitchen very excitedly. The young girl was ready for yet another day of school, but first she had to have breakfast as she usually did. She sat herself down on a seat, and awaited for her brother to come in and serve her breakfast.

"Morning, Chamametchi." A young male's voice said. Mametchi stepped into the kitchen, and smiled at his sister. "So, what do you want today?" He asked her. "Do you wanna try my homemade style frozen waffles that I'm testing?"

"Eww, no Mametchi! How about you get me some crispy honey packers!" She told her brother, pointing towards the shelf where he kept the cereal. "Pleeease!"

"Fine, fine.." Mametchi sighed, walking up to the cabinet, and slowly opening it. He casually took the unopened box of cereal, and then walked to a counter which had Chamametchi's cereal bowl there. He opened up the box, and started to pour down the cereal. He soon left for a few moments to get the milk...

***

Ash’s world suddenly went crazy. First he heard the voices talking about waffles and something called honey packers, then the entire structure he was in was suddenly lifted upward, and then it was moving. If he’d been a fan of the Twilight Zone it probably would’ve clicked in what was going on. Instead he was in a complete shock when the roof of the structure was torn open with a loud cardboard sound and light streamed in.

Blinking he looked skyward for a moment, not seeing anything. Then he felt everything being lifted and then everything tipped, the contents of the structure, along with Jon tumbling like an avalanche out the opened roof.

Right into the largest bowl he’d ever seen in his life.

Coughing up dusty sugar but thankfully unhurt, he looked skyward and if he wasn’t so congested from the sugary powder would’ve scream up at the giant creature above him. It was massive whatever it was but before he could get a good look at it, it was gone.

What the hell was going on?

***

A few moments later, Mametchi came back to the bowl with a gallon of milk. Slowly, he started to pour down milk into the bowl, not stopping until it was almost full. "And done." He said, grabbing the plate, and taking it to the table where his sister sat.

"Yay! Thanks big brother!" Chamametchi smiled, suddenly grabbing her spoon, and suddenly getting a mouth full of cereal on her spoon. She then lifted it to her mouth, and bit down on it, smiling happily as she chewed the sugary cereal.

She slowly went down for her second mouthful..
15.title: The Beginning of a new Day

choices: Chamametchi Notices something in her spoon
Ash desperately tries to escape the spoon
151.content:
The creature came back. This time it carried a glass jar filled with a white liquid, which it dumped down on Ash as if he’d be caught under a waterfall. The liquid was numbingly cold and for a few moments it seemed like he would drown in it but he kicked upward and broke the surface. He got a mouth full of the stuff. It was milk. A bit richer in taste than what he was used to but it was milk all the same.

“And Done”

Done? Done of what? BeforeAsh could figure it out the bowl was lifted and carried, the contents being sloshed around. Grabbing onto one of the “inner tubes”. He felt the bowl set down. Looking up he saw another giant creature. This one looked back down, but didn’t see him. It had a look on its face, one Ash recognized.

Hunger.

A huge spoon came into view. Ash realized what was happening but powerless to do anything to stop it. A spoon full of what he now knew was cereal was lifted up to it’s mouth. It ate slowly happily chewing its mouthful. It slowly lowered the spoon as it swallowed. It was coming right for him. He wanted to swim but his numb legs refused to move. The spoon went under him and he was lifted upward.

“N-no, D-don’t…” was all Ash could say as it slowly opened it’s huge mouth.

Chamametchi got herself another mouthful of the cereal. What was unknown to her was that there was something other then cereal in her spoon. Something that was considered so small, she probably had a really small chance of noticing it. Heck, she probably would just chew it up like it was nothing!"
151.title: Scooped up

choices: Her Brother wants to see it
Plays with Ash in her room
1511.content:
Chamametchi opened her mouth, and slowly led the spoon into her mouth. It looked to be the end of the small creature's life, when suddenly, she stopped, and slowly pulled the spoon back. "Huh? Mametchi, what's this in my cereal?" She looked down at something that was very small. She couldn't really recognize it.. But it was something weird.

"Huh?" Mametchi walked to his sister, and glared at the strange thing. "Hmm, maybe it's a toy that came with the cereal? I don't know. Good thing that you saw it before you ate it! We wouldn't want that to happen, eh?"

Chamametchi slowly got her other hand, and picked up the small creature with only two fingers. With a grin, she examined it. "Oooooh, I wonder what this is.."


Ash stared into the huge mouth and could help but think how incredible it looked. Huge white teeth large enough to grind him to bits, a wide quivering tongue ready to taste him and a vast throat opened up to accept whatever would be left of him. He felt the spoon scrap up against the bottom teeth.

‘This is it,’ he thought. ‘I’m going to be chewed up, I’m going to be swallowed and how I’m going to look coming out the other end I don’t want to know.’

Suddenly when the spoon was halfway into the huge mouth it stopped and was pulled back out. The creature, which Ash concluded was a girl was looking down into the spoon. Looking down at him in fact.

The next thing he knew he was firmly grasped between the tips of a huge finger and apposing thumb.

“Oooooh, I wonder what this is..” he heard her say as she continued to eat her cereal. Ash’s limbs were warming up thanks to the comforting warmth given off by this what ever she was, but they were pinned between her finger and thumb. Not that he could move even if he wanted to. He was too frightened to move. Still he couldn’t help but watch in personal interest as she ate mouth full after mouth full. In fact he found himself strangely enjoying watching her eat.

She also was looking him over, no doubt wondering what he was. She had probably never seen anything like Jon in her life. He was totally at her mercy, and he wondered what she’d do next.
1511.title: Discovered

15111.content:
As Chamametchi continued to eat her cereal, Mametchi started to carefully look at the creature in her grasp. While Chamametchi had no idea what it was and probably thought it was a strange toy, Mametchi knew exactly what kind of thing it was.. A human from the other planet far away. He wanted to inspect that human later, and see how he ended up in a cereal box.

After a few minutes, Chamametchi was all done with her cereal. "I'm done, that was yummy Mametchi!" She smiled at her brother, before grinning back at her new toy. "So, Mametchi... Can I pleeeeease take my new toy to school today? I'm sure no one has one of whatever this thingy is!"

"Uh, not today Chamametchi." He said, not taking his eyes away from the 'toy'. "I'll leave him here, and I'll let you play with him when you get home though.."

"Aww, fine big brother..." She whined. She suddenly slowly put the creature onto the table. "You'll take good care of it, and not get a single scratch on it, right brother?"

"Don't worry Chamametchi. It'll be fine.. Now, you better get going, I think the school bus should be here any minute!"

Ash looked up at the being addressed as Mametchi. He was looking back at him. Probably wondering the same thing he was, where had he come from.

“Remember big brother, not a single scratch!”

“I promise, Chamametchi.” Said Mametchi “Now hurry up before you miss the bus.”

When Chamametchi left, Mametchi looked more closely at Ash. “I know you’re a Human, and I’m pretty sure you can understand me. I’m not going to hurt you, I’m just going to take you to my lab. I’m going to pick you up now.”

Mametchi’s fingers were larger than Chamametchi’s and when they closed around him only Jon’s head poked out from between the tips of his thumb and finger. “I hope I’m not holding you too tightly” he said as he carried him a short distance to his lab.

Mametchi placed Ash on a table then placed what looked like a microphone next to him.

“Okay, This could be very important. Tell me everything you know, from the beginning.”
15111.title: Contact

choices: Fast forward to later that evening
151111.content:
Mametchi had taken the small human to his lab. A large strange looking place filled with so many of his former inventions. Most of them are complete failures sadly. Mametchi wasn't much of a proficient inventor, he barely makes his money back on the stuff he invents. He sat himself down on a chair, and looked at the little human he was interrogating all of a sudden.

He didn't seem to get a answer from the human at first, which made him grow a frown. Perhaps he needed to try harder to gain his trust. "Don't be afraid to answer me human. I'm a scientist and inventor of this planet. My father owns a big laboratory, and they study your own planet, Earth." He explained. "That doesn't explain how you got to our planet though, and I think you would like to return back to home, so please listen to me little human... Tell me what happened the last night before you came here. Please."

“I-I don’t know.” Ash finally said. “ The day seemed normal enough, I ate that evening I went to bed just like I normally do, only this time I woke up in a cereal box! The next thing I know I’m almost drowned in a ocean of milk and almost became a part of a balance breakfast!”

“My sister didn’t mean to—“

“No, no. I’m not blaming anyone. Accidents happen. Even the more bizarre ones.” Ash looked up at Mametchi. “I want to go home, but I also have this strong desire to explore this world of yours. It’s a ‘boldly go where no one has gone before’ thing. I’m sure you can understand that.”

Mametchi nodded. “Okay, I’ll run a few tests . Nothing physical just scans. And then I’ll leave you in the care of my sister.”

“Isn’t that a little dangerous? She thinks I’m a prize out of a cereal box.”

“No, she’s very careful,” Said Mametchi “You’ll be just fine.”
151111.title: Mametchi's care

1511112.content:
"Hmmph.." Mametchi stared at his computer screen as the tests were being given. The tests were simply a laser scanning Ash for several moments. Everything seemed fine so far to Mametchi, but he did notice something that seemed somewhat off... He noticed that his size was not correct.

"Well, I notice one thing that's off. Your size." Mametchi said. "You are not normal sized to humans right now. You are below a inch tall in human scale. And at my people's scale, you are a inch tall. You see, I'm not a giant. You just happened to have shrunken down somehow. If you were normal sized, we'd appear to be three or so feet tall. This is strange. I need to investigate how you shrunk. That's a even bigger mystery.."

"And by the way." Mametchi started. "there actually is a way to get you back home. But I don't think you'd want to return home at less then a inch tall, would you?"

“No, I guess not.” Said Ash. “though the prospect is somewhat fascinating, I highly doubt I’d survive long. I’m not even sure how I’m going to survive here. Well, at least we’ve established that I’m shrunk and your normal sized, however unbelievable that may be for me. Any Idea how this happened?”

“Not yet, I won’t have the results until tomorrow.” Mametchi replied. “at least all your vitals appear normal” He frowned at the scans “there’s something here that’s familiar but I can’t put my finger on it.” He looked down at Jon “You’re a real mystery, a human who appears in a place he’s not suppose to be and mysteriously miniaturized.”

“So, If you do manage to restore my size, How are you going to send me back?”

"Well, it's simple.. Once you are hopefully returned back to normal, I'd have to use a invention of mine." He pointed towards a strange looking machine with a door. "That's my transporter machine I've been working on lately.that's just the beta version of it. The real more improved version of it is in my father's main laboratory. With a simple use of a button, I could just zap you right back home."

He then looked back at Ash. "School will be over soon for Chamametchi you know. Today was a early day for her. She might even bring a few of her friends with her. But don't worry, she's careful like I said. She's very protective of her toys, which is what she considers you to be..." He explained. "I might also have a few of my own friends come here to inspect on you as well to figure out what are you truly doing on here."

“What are you talking about?” asked Ash. “I’ve told you everything I know.”

“So you claim,” said Mametchi “I’m not so sure you’re telling the truth. But since I don’t see how an inch tall human is a threat, I’m going to take you to my sister’s room. That’s where she’ll expect you to be.”

Suddenly, Mametchi slowly picked up the small human the same way he had done before, maybe a little more soft this time. "Now then, let me take you to my sister's room." As he left the lab, he took the human to a very colorful looking room. It looked like any pink obsessed little girl's room, only a thousand times bigger. "I'll leave you right here..." He said, slowly placing him onto a small pink tea table.

The door suddenly knocked. "That's probably Chamametchi. I have to go open the door for her.."

Ash sat down on the table thinking about his current situation. Not only was he marooned on another planet, not only had he been miniaturized, but he wasn’t trusted either. He had done nothing wrong, he hadn’t asked for any of this. Well, no sense in crying over it. He might as well make do with what fate had given him. Which was at the moment being a toy to an alien girl. He hoped Mametchi was right about his sister being careful. He’d hate to be accidentally crushed by her.

He heard squeals of delight; Chamametchi was coming. Ash hoped he was ready.

Suddenly, the door to Chamametchi's room was suddenly slammed open, Chamametchi had finally arrived home.
1511112.title: The Mystery

choices: My little blocky city play set?
15111122.content:
Chamametchi had finally arrived home, along with one of her friends named Imotchi

"Come on Imotchi, Mametchi said he put my new toy in here!" She giggled with delight, suddenly stopping in front of the table where Ash stood was on.

"It's sooooooo cute, but it's also weird looking!" Chamametchi said.

"Hmm..." The other girl was a little less hyper, and looked at the human with a grin. "Your right, it is cute. It looks just like one of those alien things I keep on hearing about. Only, like a lot smaller and stuff!"

Ash eyed the new whatever she was with caution. She seemed friendly enough though.

“Can I pick it up?” Imotchi asked.

“Sure but be careful.”

If he were in a position to protest, Ash would’ve. Instead he allowed the alien girl to pinch him between her fingers. He was propelled upwards so quickly that his ears popped. Imotchi, continued to look him over with child like fascination.

‘Look upon me. You have never seen the likes of me before, have you?’ Ash thought as she gently patted his head.

“So, what are we going to play with it?” Imotchi asked.

‘Play? Oh that doesn’t sound good’ he thought as he looked over at Chamametchi.

“Hmmm, I think we should play…..”
15111122.title: Chamametchi has a friend

choices: Ash falls to the bed below
151111221.content:
"Hmm.... How about we play with it in... My little blocky city play set?" She pointed towards a little section of her room that was dedicated to a strange kind of toy that resembled a earth toy known as Legos. "It's great, cause he's even smaller then the tiny people that come with it, hee hee.."

"Yeah, that's a fun idea!" Imotchi exclaimed. The alien girl slowly started to walk up to the small playset, and then dropped the little human in the middle of what looked to be a toy city. "Aww, it's really cute how it looks like he belongs there.. Heh!" Imotchi laughed.

Grinning, Chamametchi started to place toy people into the city. "I know, it's really cute! Heh heh!"

When little lego men are bigger than you, it kinda brings things into perspective. Ash felt smaller than he’d ever felt since he’d shown up there. And despite himself he had to admit these kids were right. He did look like he belonged there. He looked up at Chamametchi and Imotchi imagining the two giants towering over the town he lived in, it would look no bigger to them then this little play set. He wondered what they had in mind.

"So, anyway....." Chamametchi suddenly picked Jon up again, before placing him inside a little toy blocky helicopter. "Your little toy is gonna be flying in his personal private helicopter, flying above the city, looking down at all the people." She grinned, suddenly lifting the helicopter, and making it look like it was flying.

Imotchi grinned. "That is until it crashed!" Imotchi suddenly took the helicopter from Chamametchi, hastily swiping it away from the other child. "Hey!" Chamametchi cried. "It wasn't your turn yet!"

Two things came to Ash’s mind. One, seatbelts save lives. Two, the blocky Helicopter didn’t have any. He tumbled out of the toy, squeezing his eyes tightly. He didn’t want to see the ground before he hit it.
151111221.title: Playtime

choices: Now she had her new toy all to herself.
Chamametchi wants to make sure her toy isn't broken
1511112212.content:
Much to his surprise though, he didn’t fall for long and didn’t land hard. In fact what he landed on felt warm and soft. He opened his eyes and saw to his relief that he had landed safely in the palm of Chamametchi’s hand.

Chamametchi gasped as she noticed something, right at the moment that Imotchi took the helicopter from her, her little toy suddenly started to fall down from it! She gasped, right before quickly putting her hand down towards it, safely saving it. "You could have hurt it!" Chamametchi yelled at her friend.

"How could I have hurt it? It's not even alive Chamametchi) it's just a toy! There's like a billion others!"

"No, this toy is special to me!" Chamametchi cried out. The bickering from the two young girls continued, until Mametchi bursted into the room. "What's going on here?"

“Imotchi tried to break my new toy!”

“If you don’t want her to be rough with it why don’t you put it away then?” Mametchi suggested rubbing his temples. “Can you please keep the noise down? I’m working on something important.”

“Okay,” said Chamametchi as her brother walked out of the room.

“I’m sorry Chamametchi,” said Imotchi “Maybe you should put it away.”

“Yeah, I guess so.” Chamametchi walked over to her dresser by her bed and dropped Ash in a container closing the lid over it. Fortunately, it wasn’t air tight. But he was trapped inside.

Ash slumped against the inside of the container, trembling uncontrollably. He found himself crying. He had been so close to death he thought he’d heard angle wings. It would be several hours before Jon breathed fresh air again. Imotchi had gone home, and Chamametchi opened up the container dumping Ash out into her hand.
1511112212.title: Saved

choices: He awakens after only a few hours sleep restless
15111122121.content:
After that long day with her best friend, Chamametchi was finally happy to spend some alone time with her new toy. It was a half hour before she had to go to bed, so it wouldn't be a very long time. But, it's still 30 minutes. "You know, you always looked so life like to me." She grinned at him. "Like, I can't believe cereal toys are this detailed! You look so amazing!" She told the toy, giggling as she suddenly poked at him. "No wonder why Imotchi wanted you so bad! Your the best toy out there!"

‘And I will hug him and squeeze him, and pet him, and name him George…’ Ash thought. That poke had hurt a little, but not too much. Chamametchi began to gently rub him between her thumb and finger.

“You feel squishy too. I wonder what you’re made out of.”

Ash had to admit it felt good. Almost like a full body massage, rubbing out all the tension from his limbs. He began to relax.

Chamametchi however was starting to become more and more curious of this little guy. She had spent the entire half hour examining him, and looking all over the little guy's body. Just like her brother, she was curious about everything, and this toy seemed very life like..

"Okay Chamametchi!" The door suddenly opened. "It's time for bed. Put your toy away." Mametchi said, stepping into the room.

“Okay,” said Chamametchi putting Ash back into the container. She climbed into bed and Mametchi tucked her in and left the room shutting the light off as he went. Ash was surprised however when he felt Chamametchi’s fingers close around him and pick him up.

For some reason Chamametchi had gotten the notion that she didn’t want her toy to sleep alone. She climbed back into bed, pulled the covers up and placed her toy on the pillow next to her head.

“Goodnight” she whispered kissing the tip of her finger and pressing it onto Ash. For Ash it felt oddly reassuring that this person cared for him that much. And as he drifted off to sleep he wondered what tomorrow would bring.
15111122121.title: Examination

choices: "I may not be able to restore your size."
151111221211.content:
Early the next morning, Mametchi opened Chamametchi's door, making a somewhat loud creaking noise as he did so. "Chamametchi, it's time to get up today!" Mametchi said, walking up to his sister's bed. He noticed that Jon was sleeping with her.. He smiled slightly, perhaps his sister was really getting attached to this 'toy'

"Wha... Wazzza?" Chamametchi slowly woke up, before yawning and sitting herself up. "Oh! Mametchi, I had the best dream ever last night! I dreamt that my toy was alive, and we had all the fun in the world!! It was so cute!!"

"haha, that sounds nice Chamametchi." Mametchi smiled. "Now, get ready. It's time for another day at school you know."

Chamametchi climbed out of bed leaving Jon and Mametchi alone.

“how was your night?” Mametchi asked.

“All right I guess.” Replied Ash “Strange dreams.”

“ I can imagine. First I’ll get Chamametchi ready for school, then I’ll take you to the lab. I’ve found something that may interest you. I need your full attention while I inform you about it, so please get some rest while I go get Chamametchi ready for school, alright?" Mametchi asked Ash. The little human nodded at him.

"Okay, I'll be back soon.. Until then, just try to rest until I get back up here, alright?"

Ash laid down and closed his eyes, he did sleep but his dreams were plagued with horrible situations, in one he was back in Chamametchi’s spoon about to be eaten, only this time she didn’t see him and chewed him up slowly along with her cereal, her giggling heard all around him. In another he was running for his life as Mametchi lifted a foot up and slammed it down on top of him crushing him like a bug, and yet another with Imotchi forcing him to wear a polka dot dress. That had been the weirdest one off all.

He was awaken by Mametchi coming into the lab. “You okay?” He asked.

“Fine,” said Ash “Just more weird dreams. It’s like my mind is trying to process all the recent events. So, you said you had some news to tell me.”

"Well, yeah. I do have something to tell you." Mametchi looked down upon Jon with a curious expression. "I'm going to have to take you to my lab to show you what I found out." Suddenly, Mametchi picked up the little human like he had done before. He really hoped Ash didn't mind the way he grabbed him.. It seemed a little harsh, and made it seem like he was just a tiny object of sorts.

He arrived in his lab. As soon as he did so, he placed Jon right beside his computer, and Mametchi continued to do his work on the human. "Well.. If you look here on the screen, I've noticed something.. Kind of odd, but really interesting and useful for you..." He turned the computer screen towards Ash.
151111221211.title: The Next Morning

1511112212111.content:
“What the heck is that?”

“Never saw it before?”

“Never.”

"Let me explain a little better.." Mametchi looked back at his screen for a moment. "This little strand of Data I found for you is uh... Really something." He shook his head. "Apparently, somehow.. You are a mix between both a human, and a tamagotchi." He explained, hoping Jon wouldn't be too shocked. "Don't be alarmed... Um, that has nothing to do with your size changing but.. In a way, you could possibly mutant to look more like my kind of people.. I don't know when that will happen, or if it even will happen.. That's why, I'm gonna need to take you to a friend of mine, Tensitchi. A scientist who happens to be a expert on humans and space travel."

“I’m…I’m a hybrid?” Ash was dumbfounded.

“Well, a simplification term of what you are but correct.”

“How the heck can that be? I can tell you right now both my parents were human, so it didn’t happen that way! Wait, what about some sort of genetic transference?”

Mametchi thought for a moment, “Possible, but I don’t see how---“

“You’ve been handling me since yesterday.”Ash explained “ Your sister was rubbing me between her fingers, now it all sounds sci-fi but what if I’ve been in a state of flux since I’ve arrived. Somehow your DNA has become integrated in to my genetic code.”

Mametchi rubbed his chin for just a moment, perhaps that was what was beginning to happen to the human... If so, Mametchi started to feel a little guilty for letting that happen. Like he had said, it is possible for the human to mutant into a creature that is just like them.. He sighed sadly. "If you do not mind, I'll be taking you to my friend so we can further research this issue..." He nodded to himself, before picking up the human again.

He walked outside of his home, and entered a strange UFO like object. "That's my automobile.. I know it looks different from your planet's."

“Well, So long as it gets us there that’s fine with me.” Said Ash “I just hope I don’t go Brundlefly on you before we get there.”

“Brundle what?”

“It’s from a movie,” Ash explained as Mametchi climbed into his Auto, “A scientist named Brundle gets his DNA fused with a flying insect during a teleportation accident. The resulting creature was called Brundlefly. In the movie Brundle mutates into it in a very brutal and painful way.”

“Sounds horrible.”

“It is, Lets hope that doesn’t happen.”

Once Mametchi had climbed into his strange automobile, the machine started to float, and started to fly. Mametchi was controlling the automobile rather easily, just with a single joystick like object. "My friend, Tensaitchi actually has been to your planet before.. (Link for info: http://tamagotchi.wikia.com/wiki/Tensait... )Pretty much all of his years of research is related to your kind of people." Mametchi went on and on about his friend, before he finally stopped his machine in front of another house, where Tensaitchi was already waiting.

"Ah, Mametchi?" Tensaitchi said, walking up to the automobile. "Where is the human?"

“Right here.” Said Mametchi holding his hand up so Tensaitchi could see the human, if he could be called a human at this point. Ash wasn’t so sure anymore. He didn’t feel any different. Not yet anyway.

“Hmmm, at lot smaller than they’re suppose to be. Some type of miniaturization process?”

Mametchi nodded, “That was my conclusion as well.”

“Lets get him inside and see if we can’t figure this out.”
1511112212111.title: “What the heck is that?”

15111122121111.content:
“Looks like you thought was correct, Ash.” Said Tensaitchi looking over the readouts. “the good news is that your no longer in a state of flux. The bad news is that the damage is done. I’m afraid our tamagotchi DNA has taken root so to speak. It’s very aggressive, and it’s overwhelming your Human DNA.”

“How long before I begin to feel the effects?” Ash sounded like a man who has just learned he had a terminal disease. Which wasn’t far from the truth.

“A matter of hours. I’m sorry but there’s nothing we can do to stop it.”

“So, I’m going to become like you then.” Ash sighed, “I can’t go home. Not like this. Thank you for your help.”

Mametchi rubbed one of his very large fingers on Ash, he really understood how terrible this was for Ash. Having been shrunken down, and now becoming a completely different kind of creature in only a matter of hours. "Tensaitchi?" Mametchi looked at his older friend with a curious look. "How will the change be? Would it be painful for him?"

"I expect so." Tensaitchi sighed, rubbing his glasses while growing a frown. "He'll just have to tough it out. I believe it will be seriously painful.. Because after all, his entire body is going to have to be mutated into one of us." He looked down at Ash "Or if you want to compare this to your Doctor Who program, regenerate into one of us."

"Hmm..." Mametchi sighed slightly. "I guess we shall be going now.. I should also reveal the truth to Chamametchi.." Mametchi picked up Ash just like he had always done before. Saying goodbye to his friend, Mametchi left his friend's home. "Ash, I'm very sorry about all of this." Mametchi said. "Your going through so much pain right now I know.."

“ There is no need to be sorry, Mametchi. There’s nothing that can be done about it now. I think it’s starting.”

“How does it feel?” asked Mametchi.

“It feels like a dull ach all over my body,” Ash answered. “it feels like it’s slowly growing in intensity.”

“I wish I could give you something for the pain, but I don’t know if it’ll even be effective.”

“Don’t worry about it. Lets just get back to your place. What are you going to tell Chamametchi?”
15111122121111.title: Regeneration

151111221211111.content:
Ash looked at his hand, in his mind he could see the cells of his body going into cellular chaos, to him the pain he was going through was akin to being born. In a way he was being born again, he was turning into something else. Regeneration. The more he thought about it he began to think that it wasn't such a terrible thing. Most people would give anything to be turned into something else.

Mametchi stepped into his strange vehicle, and started to fly away back to his home. While he was driving, he had a frown on his face as he thought about what was happening to Ash now. "Though remember this Ash." Mametchi started. "Since that you are now becoming one of what I am, I believe Me and Chamametchi shall be caring of you." Mametchi started. "We'll take care of you, because after all, it is completely our fault for what Is happening, and I think that's the only way to make it up.."

Mametchi parked his flying vehicle outside of his house. He also noticed that Chamametchi's bus was coming already. The school bus stopped near Mametchi's house, and Chamametchi walked out. "Mametchi?" Chamametchi curiously stepped up to her brother. "Why are you outside.. And why are you holding my toy?"

"Uh... Well, I need to explain something to you Chamametchi.." Mametchi frowned. "You see, your toy isn't a toy, it's a living human. His name is Ash."

What?" Chamametchi looked up at him with a confused look. "so... He's a human? Not a toy?"

"Well, yes... But not for much longer... Some complications have happened, uh.."

“What your brother is trying to say is, I’m going to change.” Said Ash. Chamametchi’s eyes widen in surprise, not quite understanding what was happening He thought of the perfect words to say, he found them. “ And I’m not going to see you again. Not like this, not with this daft old face.”

Chamametchi, looked at Ash. She didn’t understand. “It’s okay, everything is going to be okay. Mametchi, can we go inside?”

“Of course,” Mametchi carried Jon into the house with his sister following him close behind.

Mametchi, placed Ash in Chamametchi’s cupped hand. “I’m going to get something from the lab. I’ll be right back.”
151111221211111.title: The Truth

1511112212111111.content:
As Mametchi left, Chamametchi looked down at her tiny human. So, it wasn't a toy all along. This made Chamametchi feel a little strange inside. Had she all this time been treating this person like it was some kind of object? That made Chamametchi feel so guilty inside. What if she really did end up eating the little guy in her cereal if she never saw him? That would have made her a murderer, even if she never knew!

"Uh... Ash, that was your name?" Chamametchi asked. "No wonder why you felt so real... So lifelike.. You were always real.." Chamametchi still was confused, she wasn't sure what to say to the man.

“Yes, that’s my name.” Ash looked up at Chamametchi, “Something’s bothering you I can tell.”

“It’s just that, I treated you so badly, and I almost murder—“

“Stop right there, Chamametchi. You didn’t know I was in your breakfast. If you had eaten me it would’ve been an accident, not murder. You didn’t intentionally try to eat me. You may think you treated me badly, but you didn’t. You saved my life when I fell out of that toy helicopter, and you handled me with great care and gentleness. You have nothing to feel bad about.”

Chamametchi smiled, placing the tip of her finger on Ash, he did his best to return the affection by hugging the tip of her finger. Or at least as much as he could get his arms around.

Mametchi came back, with some sort of gadget in his hands. "Alright, Ash, I need to tell you something, very, very important." Mametchi started, looking at his strange device with a serious look. "As soon as the pain from the change starts to become unbearable, tell me. I'll use my sleeping gas on you so you could sleep through it. I don't want you to be in pain, so that's why I'm doing this."

Chamametchi then looked back at Ash. "It's gonna be okay, I'm going to take care of you for the rest of your life!" Chamametchi said happily, smiling down at her new friend. "No matter what!"
1511112212111111.title: Quiet time with Chamametchi

15111122121111111.content:
They spent the evening, waiting. Ash’s pain steadily increasing. Chamametchi, continued to hold her little friend, stroking his back with the tip of her finger. Mametchi, monitored Jon’s vitals. His heart rate was up, but that was expected for the level of pain he was in. He admired the human’s pain threshold, but he knew it was only a matter of time. Chamametchi was worried but Ash reassured the best he could.

Then suddenly it Hit Ash like a ton of Bricks. Pure agonizing pain. His sudden outcry of pain startled both Mametchi and his sister.

“It-it’s time.” Ash managed to say. Chamametchi gently lowered him onto a mat in the middle of the table. Mametchi quickly administered the gas.

Finally, Ash was asleep. Mametchi and Chamametchi started to watch the unconscious human's change into a tamagotchi. At first, it appeared that nothing was happening again, but all of a sudden, the changes started to appear suddenly. It was incredibly weird and disgusting, seeing a human's body morph into one of them. Chamametchi couldn't bear to look after a few moments, it was just so strange for her. Mametchi however, kept on watching the change in complete fascination and horror.

The change made Ash become a little shorter, and his skin became just like Mametchi's. He ended up growing the rabbit like ears that Mametchi and Chamametchi had.. It was amazing, this man only a few moments ago looked nothing like a tamagotchi..

Mametchi checked Ash’s vitals. They were all normal, for a tamagotchi. Other than his size, he looked completely like one of them. Mametchi let Ash sleep; he had gone through so much he felt it was best to let him recover.

Packing him up in a cloth Chamametchi carried Ash into her bedroom. Sad, that this had happened but relieved it was over. They went to bed that night and in his induced slumber, Ash didn’t dream.

Chamametchi was the first to wake up the next morning. She went over to Ash with anticipation. Slowly he began to stir. His new eyes opened and he looked up at her.

“Hello—“ His voice sounded different. He paused noting something.

“Mametchi, come quick!”

Mametchi ran into the room looking at the new Ash wondering so many things, was he mentally the same? Did he have control of his new body? Finally Ash spoke again.

“New teeth, that’s weird.”

"Well..." Mametchi sighed, shaking his head slightly. "Your going to notice that a lot of things are different you know. Why don't you try to walk, and get used to your new body?" Mametchi asked Ash, closely examining the human turned tamagotchi.

"Uh, Mametchi?" Chamametchi looked up at her older brother with a slight smile. "I think Ash looks so cute now.. He looks kind of just like you, hee hee!" She giggled loudly, before looking down at Ash again. "Maybe.. Maybe of you don't mind, I can show you to all my friends. They wouldn't hurt you if they know your a Tamagotchi just like us now!"

“Woah, wait a sec, let me get use to this new body first!” Said Ash laughing as he began to take his first few steps in his new form. “I feel like a kid trying to walk for the first time!”

Ash did eventually meet Chamametchi’s friends. All surprised to meet a tiny Tamagotchi who used to be a human. Being a fan of Earth TV shows Tensaitchi gave Ash the Nickname “The Doctor”, even Ash agreed it seemed appropriate, even went so far in sleeping in a “TARDIS"” made from Chamametchi’s Blocks.

His old life on Earth was over. His new life with Mametchi and Chamametchi was just beginning.

The End

or
15111122121111111.title: It begins

info.brief_description: Ash must survived being shrunk in a cartoon world.
info.description:
Your name is Ash (well because Matt is used too much) and like the tile says your tiny in a cartoon world. What world? I'll leave it up to you. Anything you want whether it's Sonic, Arthur (PBS series) Simpsons, Anime, whatever you like. I do have a guideline though.

1)No one sentence chapters. You know the kind I'm talking about right? "She walked up and stepped on Ash. The End." I understand not everyone can write three or four paragraphs but try to make the chapters at least one paragraph. Spelling is important but I'm not too fussy about that. I can't spell that good myself.

2)I write in the first person (I This, I that,) however, it's not something you have to stick with with. Use whatever style your comfortable with.

3)It's not necessary to write anything that's sexually oriented, just make it interesting. However I've read a lot of Shrinking interactives here over the years. So, just in case, anything involving shit or pee or toilets in general I have to say no to. Everything else (Vore, feet, Unaware,etc) is fine.

*EDIT* There was a Question if footplay was allowed. Yes, by all means, if you want to write about a character using Ash as a foot toy go right ahead.

4)Ash can encounter male or female characters.

5)Now for the important part. Some toons have under age characters (come on, you knew this was coming), please nothing sexual with these characters. There can be interaction but try to keep it clean. Anything goes when it comes to older characters.

If you add to my story I'll add to yours. Not only will the interactives get bigger but it will help keep the creativity going.

EDITIf you think your writing skills suck, or whatever the case may be, but You have an idea for a chapter then just email me an idea for a chapter.
